A new toggle in the upload experience lets admins specify whether the data is current or historical. For historical uploads, admins can assign an effective date to the file, ensuring accurate ingestion and processing by downstream apps like Viva Insights. This update improves data consistency across M365 and Viva apps and supports retroactive updates for organizational reporting.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Metadata understanding in SharePoint agents
item.description:
This update will allow agents grounded in SharePoint library contents to use and reason over available metadata to better distinguish between similar documents and provide higher-quality answers.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat - General Availability for the DoD environment
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Copilot is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 DOD users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the DOD compliance boundary.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Harmful Content Protection Controls in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
We’re introducing a new policy setting in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat that gives administrators enhanced control over how users interact with harmful content protection. This feature is designed to support specialized roles—such as legal, investigative, or moderation teams—where exposure to sensitive content may be necessary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/microsoft-365/harmful-content-protection-copilot-chat
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: PowerPoint: Refreshed Placeholders in PowerPoint on Desktop
item.description:
Placeholders in PowerPoint are getting refreshed to look more modern and provide clear guidance on the object that can be inserted. Image placeholders now allow you to pick from a variety of sources to insert an image. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we are rolling this out early to resolve an issue that some customers were experiencing
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
item.description:
Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
item.description:
Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Rich artifacts in Copilot Pages
item.description:
You can now create rich artifacts, including interactive charts, tables, complex diagrams, and code created with Copilot from enterprise or web data. Artifacts can be added to Pages to further edit and refine with Copilot. They are interactive and stay in sync across Microsoft 365 when shared for collaborative work.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Word: Chat with Copilot about selected text
item.description:
Start a chat with Copilot while text in your document is selected, and Copilot's response will be scoped to what you have selected.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Seamless Search and Chat Integration
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Chat brings the power of conversational AI directly into Microsoft 365 Copilot Search, enabling users to move effortlessly from finding information to acting on it. Search results become the foundation for contextual chat, allowing you to ask follow-up questions, synthesize insights, and generate content—all in one unified experience. This integration reduces workflow fragmentation, accelerates decision-making, and delivers a more intuitive way to interact with your organization’s knowledge.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Introduction of pay-as-you-go feature usage report
item.description:
Introducing a Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management pay-as-you-go feature usage report designed to provide transparency to the customers, enabling more accurate budget planning and policy tuning. This report provides granular breakdowns of billed processing unit usage across different data source categories and activity indicators over time, empowering IRM admins to identify cost-saving opportunities and tune their policies.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Chat] Launch the full Microsoft 365 Copilot app when using Copilot Chat in the Microsoft 365 apps
item.description:
When using the Copilot Chat side pane in Microsoft 365 apps, users will be able to launch the full Microsoft 365 Copilot app from a dedicated button. Additionally, accessing some features in the side pane will launch the full app.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Automatic Draft Minimize
item.description:
When users close a draft in progress, it automatically minimizes instead of closing completely. The minimized draft can now be quickly accessed via a button that appears in the message list.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated UI for Copilot Chat Navigation Pane in Outlook
item.description:
The navigation pane has been repositioned from the right side to the left, offering a more intuitive layout. Despite the shift, it continues to host agents and conversation history, ensuring continuity in user experience. This redesign introduces new features, including access to the "All Conversations" page, which provides a comprehensive view of chat history. The change aims to enhance usability and streamline navigation within Copilot Chat.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Information Protection- Scan existing files in SharePoint and OneDrive for business for sensitive information
item.description:
This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for business for sensitive data.
GA date: May CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Expanded Input Box on Copilot Chat
item.description:
Users will be able to expand the Input Box to a full screen view when they type long prompts with lengthy context or instructions. When users copy paste prompts from word editors the prompt box will maintain plain text formatting to sustain readability and review of the prompt.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
item.description:
Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Enhancements to variant limits and detection groups
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management variant limit is being increased from 3 to 10 per indicator and an overall limit of 100 across all indicators. Along with this, the number of items in one detection group is being increased from 200 to 500.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Permission details for agents in MAC
item.description:
The new Unified Permissions Management feature gives admins a consistent view of all required applications and delegated permissions, along with their associated risk levels, enabling clearer understanding of consents. From the permissions tab, admins can now provide consent directly, and once granted by the Global Admin, the AI Admin Role can deploy agents. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot Chat for Teams Chats, Channels, Calling and Meetings
item.description:
Copilot Chat will soon be available for Teams chats, channels, calling and meetings.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Immersive Search
item.description:
After completing a search in Outlook, a user will see a Copilot entry point that will take them to an LLM generated summary of their search query (emails, Teams messages and documents) within their Copilot side pane. They will be able to interact further with Copilot to dig deeper into these results and take action items accordingly.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New inline data protection in Edge for Business for unmanaged Windows and macOS devices
item.description:
Following further review, we mistakenly marked the roadmap as "launched." The correct status is In Development. We apologize the inconvenience. When using Microsoft Edge for Business as the secure enterprise browser, Admins in Purview DLP can now configure policies that apply protections directly in the Edge browser that target scenarios where users on unmanaged (or BYO) devices are sharing data to or exfiltrating data from org-managed cloud apps (apps which use Entra authentication for user sign-in).
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced Copilot in Engage
item.description:
Copilot in Engage has now been integrated with M365,providing the same rich access to the M365 Graph, and helping you natively access Microsoft data in the flow of Engage. Alongside this update, you can expect improved AI-powered writing assistance that bring in email/chat/files data to help craft both the content and style of your message
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational Messages now supports Hybrid-joined Devices
item.description:
Organizational Messages now supports Hybrid-joined Devices.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational Messages now supports Action Segments
item.description:
Action Segments empowers IT Admins to target Organizational Messages using dynamic, pre-defined usage segments. This behavior-based targeting approach goes beyond existing static group definitions, ensuring messages reach the most relevant users.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Snooze, Pin and Ignore in the read pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
Snooze, pin, and ignore actions are available in the read pop-out ribbon in Outlook for Web and Windows to improve triage efficiency and user control. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Voice chat in Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description:
Voice in Microsoft 365 Copilot brings a natural, hands-free conversational experience to your desktop and mobile devices – enabling you to talk to Copilot like a colleague, unlocking a faster, more intuitive way to work. Speak directly to M365 Copilot to search for information, catch up between meetings, brainstorm out loud, and do it all in multiple languages.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat Tools Control
item.description:
Tools acts as a lightweight entry point into high-value, task-specific Copilot features and capabilities directly from the prompt box. By selecting Tools, users get a menu where they can easily discover and trigger the right Copilot feature or capability for their current task, while also providing consistent interactions across tools.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Global Address List Redesign
item.description:
The Global Address List, or Address Book, is getting a major visual redesign to make it easier to navigate, show more contact information in the search results list, improve its accessibility, and improve its appearance overall. This window is accessible via the To/Cc/Bcc buttons in the email compose form. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Editor (Proofing and Spellcheck) for GCC Mod
item.description:
Automatic spelling and grammar checking when composing an email message. Corrections are underlined on the draft, and clicking on them reveals suggested corrections. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Ask Copilot from the address bar
item.description:
When users type a search query in the Edge address bar, they will have the option to send their search query directly to Copilot for a synthesized, more targeted answer pulling from across the web (and their work content, for premium users).
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
item.description:
Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat - Teams chats in ContextIQ
item.description:
Users will be able to search for and select Teams chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in Copilot Chat.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Resource performance report for Windows physical PCs for GCCH
item.description:
The resource performance scores and insights for physical devices are aimed to help IT admins make CPU/RAM asset management and purchase decisions that improve the user experience while balancing hardware costs.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Add Search results as references to your Copilot Notebooks in the M365 Copilot app
item.description:
Users can quickly add a Search result as a reference to a Copilot Notebook within the M365 Copilot app.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Start writing, coding, and creating with Copilot in Pages
item.description:
Use the tools menu in Copilot Chat to co-create content or code with Copilot in a Page and share with others when ready.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows Quality Update management policies
item.description:
Manage individual Windows quality updates including non-Security and out of band updates. Choose which update types to automatically approve and the rollout options for those approvals.
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Viva: View and moderate private community content without being a member
item.description:
This feature enables verified admins and Engage admins to access and moderate private community conversations without needing to be members of those communities. Admins will also be able to manage community settings, ensuring better governance and oversight across Viva Engage.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: News AI audio briefing
item.description:
This feature provides an AI generated audio overview of top 10 news items in the Viva Connections news reader experience. It plays the 10 audio clips sequentially to help users catch up on top news in a hands free manner. This experience will be available in the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop and in the Viva Connections experience in the browser (Accessed from the main Viva home portal - viva.cloud.microsoft).
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Customization of app installs with Enterprise Application Management
item.description:
Script installer offers you a way to have more control and customization around Win32 (including in EAM catalog) app installations. You now have the option to use a PowerShell script in place of command line configurations to install your app.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Exchange: High Volume Email for Microsoft 365
item.description:
High Volume Email is a new service for line of business applications and other high-volume SMTP scenarios that enables you to send internal messages beyond the current limits of Exchange Online.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Open Copilot Pages as a Word document
item.description:
Once a Copilot Chat user has finished researching, creating, and collecting content in Copilot Pages, they can take it to a Word document with the press of a button.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recap changes over more time
item.description:
Recapping the changes you made in Loop is no longer limited to the current session. You can now recap changes that were made over a longer period of time.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspaces for Microsoft 365 GCC
item.description:
Loop workspaces and the full Loop app experience are available to Microsoft 365 GCC customers at loop.cloud.microsoft.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
item.description:
Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
item.description:
The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Loop available in Loop components in Teams and Outlook
item.description:
People with a Copilot License can now leverage Copilot in Loop when they paste Loop components into the Teams app, Outlook, and Meeting Notes.
GA date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Loop: Copilot-assisted Loop Page Creation
item.description:
Collaborate with Copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand.
GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): New Create module with Word, Excel and PPT templates
item.description:
New Create module within M365 Copilot App to access Word, Excel and PPT templates.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.141 - Real-time video translation
item.description:
If you're learning a new language, or just like to watch foreign videos with subtitles in your preferred language, Microsoft Edge can help. With real-time video translation in Edge, you can watch videos in a different language with translated audio dub. Feature availability and functionality may vary by device type, hardware configuration (minimum 12 GB RAM and 4-core CPU), region, and platform. Availability is limited to select markets. Admins can control availability to this feature using the LiveVideoTranslationEnabled policy.
More info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge/features/real-time-video-translation
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Prepurchase Capacity Packs for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
This feature integrates pre-purchased capacity packs into Microsoft 365 admin center for M365 Copilot Chat. Administrators can apply pre-purchased message capacity to Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat before incurring pay-as-you-go charges. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Search
item.description:
Simple to use AI-powered enterprise search experience that quickly surfaces relevant information using work data you have access to.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Account Switcher for Copilot Tab
item.description:
You can now switch between accounts on the Copilot tab. Simply swipe left to open the the left-navigation and select from the list of supported accounts.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Graph API enhancements for better Relevance & UX
item.description:
Graph API for custom connectors will provide the options to configure icons, visibility, connection metadata, property descriptions and more semantic labels for improved relevance and UX.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Expand protection to Copilot + PC devices for Recall snapshots through custom policies
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Endpoint data loss prevention is expanding coverage to Copilot + PCs initially to support Recall snapshots and determining whether policies exist to prevent capture of windows containing restricted sensitivity labels and Sensitive information types (SITs). Purview admins will author Endpoint DLP custom policies to integrate with Windows Copilot + PC Recall setup by Intune admins for Copilot + PC devices exclusively.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune settings available in Catalog and Account Protection template for Adminless feature
item.description:
Adminless settings able to be configured in settings catalog and account protection template.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Additional granular RBAC controls to manage Antivirus, Firewall, BitLocker, and Endpoint Detection and Response endpoint security workloads
item.description:
Expanded granular RBAC controls to manage Endpoint Security workloads. The ‘Security baselines’ permission previously included all security policies and now all security workloads have their own permission set
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Dashboard: Copilot Chat (Web) in Teams & Outlook metrics
item.description:
Copilot Analytics users can now view metrics about their Copilot Chat (Web) usage in Teams and Outlook. These updates enable users to better understand both active usage and action counts in Teams and Outlook and will be available in the Copilot Dashboard, as well as with additional query support.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Support approvals can now be requested by non-primary users of a device.
item.description:
We're updating Endpoint Privilege Management to allow users who are not assigned as the primary user of a device to initiate support approval requests. Previously, these requests would fail, but with this change, they will be processed successfully.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Websocket Support for Tunnel MAM (iOS)
item.description:
WebSocket support for Tunnel enables secure, real-time communication for apps using WebSockets. It supports JavaScript WebSockets through web views but doesn't fully support iOS native APIs like NSWebSocket.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Live subtitles on voice chat in Copilot when using the quick composer
item.description:
Live subtitles for voice chats in Copilot will be available for users to help them follow the conversation when using the quick composer.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Live event using Teams Town hall in Viva Engage
item.description:
Community admins can now produce or stream their broadcasts using Teams Town hall, offering higher-quality production and enhanced functionality.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
item.description:
Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Enhanced scope drilldown
item.description:
Leaders and managers can drilldown and explore data in Copilot Dashboard by indirect groups, unlocking a new layer of visibility into Copilot adoption and impact. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Viva Engage - Export event posts
item.description:
Organizers & co-organizers can now download all event questions (within the past 28 days) —including status, source, timestamps, upvotes and reactions—in a .csv file for easy filtering, analysis, and sharing. The option to export questions is available by default, if there is at least one question posted, on the event page.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town hall Organizer/Co-Organizer/Presenter Join as Attendee
item.description:
Event crew members will soon be able to join a live Town hall as an Attendee during the event to monitor the experience for viewers.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Studio agents report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
item.description:
Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy Tips & Override for Outlook Mobile
item.description:
After further review, we need to roll this back. We apologize for any inconvenience. Outlook Mobile now supports Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy tips, helping users avoid accidental data leaks. When sensitive content is detected, users are alerted with inline tips or pop-ups, based on admin-configured rules. This update aligns DLP behavior across all Outlook clients for consistent compliance enforcement.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Realtime voice interactions in Word and PowerPoint
item.description:
Use your voice to talk with Copilot, interact in-real time, and understand the content within your document or presentation.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI: Department Graph
item.description:
New graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displaying the departments of users interacting with AI apps.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
item.description:
The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal - Data Loss Prevention: DLP support for Fabric Lakehouse, KQL, SQL, and Mirrored databases
item.description:
DLP policy support for Fabric will allow admins to further scope DLP policies to lakehouses in addition to Power BI (which is supported today). Now in Fabric lakehouses, DLP policies can help audit and notify users through Policy Tips based upon sensitive content. In addition, DLP policy support will also extend to Fabric KQL databases, SQL databases and mirrored databases. Mirrored databases include Mirrored Azure Cosmos DB, Mirrored Azure DB for PostgreSQL, Mirrored Azure SQL Database, Mirrored Azure SQL Managed Instance, Mirrored database, Mirrored Snowflake, and Mirrored SQL Server Database.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Hebrew support in Agent builder
item.description:
Hebrew support in Agent builder
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): The Create Module in the M365 Copilot app
item.description:
The creative hub for AI led artifact generation capabilities
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Pages module on Microsoft 365 Copilot mobile app
item.description:
With the Copilot Pages module in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on your mobile, you can now access all of your Pages in one place on the go.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create Copilot Pages from Copilot Chat on your mobile phone
item.description:
Create Copilot Pages on your mobile phone to continue working on the go. Pages shared in Microsoft 365 are interactive and automatically synchronized for seamless collaboration.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt with a co-worker
item.description:
Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Prompt Gallery, inspiring your co-workers to achieve more with Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support large documents in Word Copilot
item.description:
Support customers referencing large documents
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Ability to use the Graph connector selector when using Teams Toolkit
item.description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit to author declarative agents can select specific Graph connectors to improve their knowledge grounding.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use Kiota as an API plugin generation tool
item.description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit and Kiota can use them together as an API plugin generation tool. This unlocks new scenarios like searching our repository of public APIs, visually selecting the main integration endpoints and improving the maintainability of existing plugins by using a workspace file and allowing full regeneration of plugin files.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Automatic project scaffolding in Teams Toolkit for building Graph connectors
item.description:
Developers can now leverage an automatic project scaffolding for Graph connector applications within the Teams Toolkit, allowing for the generation of a full production-ready Graph connector application from just an API description file, significantly reducing setup time and complexity.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
item.description:
Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience
item.description:
Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience for declarative agents and API plugins in Teams Toolkit.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily write a prompt or choose quick actions from the Copilot icon in your Word doc
item.description:
The Copilot icon in your document margin makes it easy to quickly add a prompt or choose from a range of quick options Copilot can offer.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
item.description:
With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested users license assignment flow
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested user license assignment flow is a new feature in the Microsoft 365 admin center designed to help organizations streamline Microsoft 365 Copilot license assignment and optimize utilization. This feature uses a data-driven approach to suggest users who are in the best position to gain the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and efficiently assign licenses to these users.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Department Billing for Microsoft 365 Backup
item.description:
Department Billing for Microsoft 365 Backup enables administrators to configure backups by granular scopes—such as departments, geographic locations, or member firms—and manage pay-as-you-go charges across multiple Azure subscriptions. With Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), department-specific backup administrators can be assigned, ensuring management control, and tailored backup management aligned to organizational boundaries.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.140 - Improved Navigation to Extension Surfaces
item.description:
To improve visibility and discoverability, Microsoft Edge is introducing two navigation improvements for extensions. First, if a user has at least one enabled extension, the puzzle icon will be persistent on the toolbar. Second, from the Settings and more menu, the Extensions option will allow users to reach edge://extensions and the Edge Add-ons Store directly.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Unread News Notifications in Connections
item.description:
After further review, this has been delayed to a later date. We apologize for any inconvenience. Users will receive a weekly notification in the Connections apps in Microsoft Teams on mobile and desktop linking them to relevant SharePoint news that they might have missed in the preceding week. This unread news will be available in the "News" tab in the Connections app under the "unread" pill.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection: SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files
item.description:
This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files in the target library. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the document library. Changes to user permissions on the document library are reflected on downloaded files, including full revocation for users removed from the document library. This provides a more centralized information worker-managed permission model that also offers revocation capabilities at a user level, rather than per-document. 
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard Scope Filter enhancements
item.description:
Introducing exciting new features to help you better understand and improve adoption and impact of Copilot for Microsoft 365 through the Copilot Dashboard. Enhancements include supporting multi-select capabilities for Scope filters to facilitate group comparisons and the ability to upload HR organizational data for Scope filter updates.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Authoritative content management for Microsoft 365 Copilot Search
item.description:
Specify and manage SharePoint sites deemed as authoritative content to enhance their relevance and ranking in Microsoft 365 Copilot Search. In the Microsoft 365 admin center, under Copilot > Search > Authoritative content, add and manage up to 100 SharePoint sites. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 app will be updated to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments. This update includes a UI refresh and quick access to key modules like Chat, Search, Create, Apps, and Notebooks.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Unique Counting of EDM Matches
item.description:
Providing a new mode to count EDM Matches where each row is counted once in addition to the current behavior where each primary element is counted once
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Users in GCC-M will able to use custom engine agents
item.description:
Users in GCC-M will be able to use custom engine agents.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel Agent
item.description:
Channel agent works alongside you and your team to help you manage projects. It can create status reports, send emails, schedule meetings, co-author documents, and answer questions. Channel agent understands context from meetings, chats, and files, and uses that knowledge to help you move work forward. It’s designed to save time, reduce manual effort, and make collaboration more intelligent.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Dedicated download option for tracking all registrations in Webinar
item.description:
Event organizers can now download a distinct registration report (separate from an attendee list) from the Reports section of a Webinar, in order to have visibility and information about all registrants for a particular webinar instance.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Service health dashboard
item.description:
As a Microsoft Purview user, you'll be able to view outages, service issues, and advisories that might impact your services. This new dashboard will combine the services and solutions health of Purview, Microsoft 365 services, and Azure Cloud Services in one central place in the Purview portal, eliminating the need to go to several places to find this information.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Advanced Collaboration Analytics for GCC
item.description:
Advanced Collaboration Analytics for GGC provides Teams admins with insights into external collaboration patterns - covering teams, federated domains, channels, guests, and internal users - along with recommended actions to enhance security for external collaboration.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Notification Settings
item.description:
Admins can now enable/disable all learning-related notifications from a centralized settings page.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Find Text when reading email on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The ability to find text when reading email on Outlook will be supported. This feature will bear resemblance to F4 on Outlook for Windows, or Ctrl+F in another apps. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Access: Add zoom slider magnification to Microsoft Access
item.description:
Access will add magnification slider (10% to 500%) in lower right of the application, similar to the feature in Word, PowerPoint, and Excel. It will also be keyboard accessible and available on the ribbon.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Improved interaction in the subject header section on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The subject header section that shows up at the top when reading an email will be improved. This includes the component that contains meeting information when looking at a meeting invitation and other similar components. The subject header section will be more sensitive to available space and allow for a more comfortable reading experience when on smaller screens or on displays with high scale factors. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Preview Changes Before Sending Live in 'Manage what attendees see'
item.description:
Following further review, this feature started rolling out in July 2025. We apologize for any inconvenience. An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature, allowing organizers and presenters to preview changes to what is brought on or off the screen before sending them live to attendees. This capability is only available for Town hall.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Control Settings for agents with actions in Teams Toolkit
item.description:
To give admins control over whether agent makers can publish advanced agents (agents with actions) for their tenants, we are introducing a new control in the M365 admin center. This control specifically applies to advanced agents created from Teams Toolkit. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Join as attendees in Microsoft town hall and webinars from Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows can now join town halls, webinars, and structured meetings in Teams as attendees. You can attend directly from the invited Teams Room, with the same features that attendees have for all events. Available in Teams Rooms Pro.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: SharePoint agents are available in Teams app Store
item.description:
You can find and add SharePoint agents from the Teams app Store.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Agents in Teams Channels
item.description:
SharePoint agents can be used in a Teams Channel similar to how they can be used in a Teams Group Chat.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy reports in Viva Insights
item.description:
Usage reporting for Copilot Academy will be available in Viva Insights via the Analyst Workbench. Users can access these reports through Excel or a PowerBI dashboard.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Occupancy status on Teams panels
item.description:
Teams panels can now smartly utilize signals from Teams Rooms devices or occupancy sensors paired with panels to indicate when a room is in use (e.g. LED glow), so you’re not surprised to find an available room is actually occupied.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator can help manage tasks and create documents
item.description:
Facilitator can help users manage tasks and create documents during meetings. In addition to the tasks that the agent is automatically capturing during the meeting, users can ask Facilitator directly through the meeting chat to create, edit, and assign tasks, which sync to Planner. For tasks related to document creation, users can assign to Facilitator and it will draft the document based on the meeting discussion. Users can also ask the agent to create a draft document on a topic discussed in the meeting.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Quick steps in the pop-out ribbon
item.description:
Quick Steps are now integrated into the ribbon of email pop-out ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows and Web. Users can access and execute their configured Quick Steps directly while reading emails in separate windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Prepare for your meeting on-the-go with Copilot
item.description:
Copilot can now help mobile users prepare for meetings on-the-go. Copilot quickly prepares you for meetings within minutes by summarizing key information such as summaries of meeting-related emails and documents, your specific actionable tasks, and a recap of the previous meeting. This helps ensure you are well-prepared upon arrival.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint – Use table of contents in PDF
item.description:
OneDrive for the web and SharePoint Online can display a table of contents if it’s already in your PDF. You can select the line item in the table of contents to jump directly to the location of that item in the page.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Add multiple SharePoint agents in a single Teams conversation
item.description:
Users can include more than one SharePoint agent as a participant in a Teams group chat, meeting chat, or channel.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Sync folder order
item.description:
The order of folders in Outlook mobile will now sync to match the folder order on other Outlook apps.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Online archive for shared mailboxes in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Online archive mailboxes will appear in the folder pane alongside other accounts, making it easier to access archived content for shared mailboxes. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: open attachments while offline in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to open and save attachments from your email without an internet connection. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Integration with Power Automate (GCC-High and DoD)
item.description:
Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: February CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to set a retention period for a policy
item.description:
Introducing the ability to define how long content captured by a Communication Compliance policy is retained. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Adaptive policy scope
item.description:
Adaptive policy scopes enable your organization to create scopes that automatically updates which users to include in your policy based on geography, group, or another user attribute. The policy will automatically update to match the criteria defined in the scope instead of you constantly needing to update the static list of users in your policies.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
item.description:
Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
item.description:
Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Recommended policy scope
item.description:
Leverage policy scope insights to understand the aggregated volume of policy violations that are missed from users that are not currently scoped into the policy. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Policy insights
item.description:
The Communication Compliance homepage will provide two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention-Endpoint DLP support classification of Azure RMS protected Office documents
item.description:
Endpoint DLP can now classify Office files stored in Windows devices that have Azure RMS protection applied. Classification will be triggered when file is used in applications or when just-in-time classification is enabled.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Improved discovery of Copilot connector sources in Microsoft 365 Copilot (optionally add chat) with Content Source filter(s)
item.description:
Improved discovery of Copilot connector sources in Microsoft 365 Copilot (optionally add chat) with Content Source filter(s).
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] [Search UX] Enable customization of icon & name for data sources in Search (& chat)
item.description:
Enable customization of icon & name for data sources in Search (& chat).
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Replace stock video footage with AI-Generated Images in Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description:
Easily swap stock visuals for AI-generated images in your videos using the Create experience in Microsoft 365 Copilot. Powered by OpenAI’s latest image generation model, this feature helps you tailor content, explain concepts more clearly, and help make your videos stand out.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Preview changes before sending content live in 'Manage what attendees see'
item.description:
An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature allows organizers and presenters to preview changes to what is going to be displayed on or off the screen before sending the changes live to attendees. This capability is only available for Town hall.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Chat for Outlook iOS and Android
item.description:
On phone devices, users currently access Copilot Chat in Outlook Mobile via a tab at the bottom of their screen (or in Apps). Outlook is introducing a new Copilot Chat overlay experience, allowing users to chat with Copilot while continuing to interact with their email, calendar, and contacts. This overlay will be context-aware—understanding what the user is viewing—so users can ask Copilot about the content on their screen. Users with M365 Copilot licenses will also benefit from Copilot’s ability to draw on Microsoft 365 Graph to provide richer, more personalized responses.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Grid keyboard navigation in calendar month view via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and Web
item.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in month view. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Read-only access to contacts within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read contacts within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Import emails from PST file to mailbox in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to import emails from .pst file to mailbox. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Outlook: Support for enhanced calendar-sharing architecture in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
item.description:
This update improves the reliability of calendar sharing and ensures that the events seen by delegates are always up to date. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: April CY2026

item.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
item.description:
Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
item.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Edit your Copilot-generated PowerPoint presentation outline via Pages in Chat
item.description:
You can now edit and collaborate on the presentation outline generated by Copilot in a Page before the PowerPoint deck is created.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Admins can deploy and govern agents with MCP in the M365 admin center
item.description:
Admins can deploy, monitor, and manage agents built with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) in the M365 admin center for secure enterprise use.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Export Team Summary report in Viva Glint to editable PowerPoint slides
item.description:
Managers will be able to export default sections from the Team Summary report in Viva Glint directly to editable PowerPoint slides. This enhancement allows for easier and quicker consumption of this report outside Viva Glint, compared to the previous export method which included static screenshots.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in DoD
item.description:
Set up and host large scale events across a DoD organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
item.description:
This introduces delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users, and German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
item.description:
Currently, Object Character Recognition (OCR) is available only for standalone images. This update supports OCR for images embedded in: 1. Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text. 2. Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX. 3. Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: AI workflows in Teams Workflows app & SharePoint document libraries
item.description:
With AI workflows in the Workflows app for Teams & SharePoint document libraries, you can build custom AI-powered templates to automate complex tasks and streamline daily operations. Admins can enable this feature to equip users with intelligent automation tools that make managing work more efficient and intuitive.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: AI Workflows in Workflows app
item.description:
With AI Workflows in the Workflows app, you will have access to custom AI-powered templates to automate complex tasks and streamline daily operations. AI Workflows enhance productivity by simplifying task execution and helping users stay organized throughout the day. Admins can enable this feature to equip users with intelligent automation tools that make managing work more efficient and intuitive.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Auto-Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to schedule an export of an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts) or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to export an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts) or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Choose save location when saving to a cloud account in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
item.description:
When you save a document to a cloud account, you will be able to browse through the folders of that account to find the place you would like to save your file.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
item.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: August CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Knowledge Agent
item.description:
Simplifies SharePoint content management and ensures content is Copilot-ready by automating metadata, fixing stale content, enabling fast page creation, improving compliance, and enriching content so Copilot can deliver more accurate, grounded answers.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Overview in Copilot Notebooks
item.description:
Quickly grasp the key topics, summaries, and insights from your Copilot Notebooks - without having to dig through every document or detail.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Show more results in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Users can ask for additional search results (emails, meetings, calendar, and files) during a multi-turn conversation by saying things like “show me more.” Copilot continues from where it left off, pulling in remaining relevant results to maintain context and improve accuracy.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote log collection in Teams admin center​
item.description:
Teams Administrators will have the ability to remotely collect client diagnostics logs for troubleshooting from users' devices, aiming to minimize or eliminate the need for user intervention and workflow disruption previously required for collecting diagnostics logs.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Agents in Copilot Chat available on Edge Sidebar
item.description:
Use agents in Copilot Chat on Edge Sidebar to simplify tasks.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Efficient Review with Advanced Minimization Algorithms
item.description:
Sophisticated algorithms analyze the review set and pick out the best set of documents to review while hiding redundant information. A new analytics relationship view and detailed reports for each analytic run through the new unified reporting format allow you to have confidence in the results. The analytical information is available in both our new insights experience and export load files, allowing you to easily adopt this efficiency boost into any workflow.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to separate out the Townhall attendee invites
item.description:
This backend change will now address the 'separation of attendee' invites from the events crew. This feature allows the organizers of Townhalls to maintain separate invites for attendees.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
item.description:
Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP) auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced personalization with memory in Copilot
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot will improve memory in Copilot by increasing the relevance and quality of Copilot responses based on previous communications. This AI-powered capability improves the relevance and quality of Copilot responses by learning from previous communications. These memories are private to the user.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot app for DoD environments
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 app will be updated to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for DoD environments. This update includes a UI refresh, a new icon, and quick access to key modules like Chat, Search, Create, Notebooks, and Apps.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Improve discovery of Champion connector prompts for Users
item.description:
Improve discovery of Champion connector prompts - inline suggestive pre & post prompts, prompt library.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Expanding access to Diagnostics to Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management
item.description:
We are expanding the access to Diagnostics beyond Global Admin to: Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Configurate format, style, and duration of Audio Overviews in Copilot Notebooks
item.description:
Users can guide Copilot on the format (podcast-style with dual voices or a single voice), style, and duration while generating an Audio Overview of their Copilot Notebook.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: eSignature - globally available
item.description:
Microsoft's native eSignature service allows users to request simple electronic signatures from Word & PDF documents in SharePoint. Recipients can easily sign documents without the documents leaving the trusted boundaries of Microsoft. This capability will be now be available in all markets with the exception of China, Indonesia and Türkiye.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Custom font and theme support for Viva Amplify
item.description:
Viva Amplify now supports custom themes and fonts published to Brand Center, empowering communicators to align their campaigns with brand identity and visual consistency across channels like Outlook and SharePoint.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot search
item.description:
A new usage report will be available in the Microsoft 365 admin center for search in Microsoft 365 Copilot. The report will include total search queries, average search queries per user, search usage trends, and per-user usage insights. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Pin agents in M365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
This feature enables AI administrators to pin specific agents in M365 Copilot Chat for all users in the tenant or defined users and groups, improving user accessibility to the most relevant and agents for their work. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Whiteboard: Text Sizing Feature
item.description:
The Text Sizing feature offers users the ability to: 1. Adjust Font Sizes: Increase or decrease font sizes as needed. 2. Preset Font Sizes: Choose from preset font sizes for convenience. 3. Custom Text Size: Input custom text sizes for enhanced clarity. This feature enhances readability, improves clarity, and establishes a structured visual hierarchy, ensuring well-organized and easily comprehensible content on the board.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Whiteboard: Sticky notes accelerator
item.description:
Sticky note accelerators will help users work faster in Whiteboard by simplifying adding sticky notes. With a single click, users can quickly add sticky notes, making brainstorming and collaboration seamless.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Agent metadata in inventory export
item.description:
Agent metadata export in Microsoft 365 admin center includes expanded metadata fields, covering Capabilities, Data Sources, Actions, Created In, and Created By. Enables enhanced visibility for auditing, governance, and lifecycle tracking. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Copilot Chat - Usage intensity and new app coverage
item.description:
The Copilot Chat usage report will include metrics on prompts submitted and expanded coverage across new host applications. Admins will now see total and average prompt counts at both tenant and user levels, along with user activity insights such as active days and last activity dates. Additionally, the report introduces visibility into Copilot Chat usage within Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote—enabling better tracking of adoption and engagement across these core Microsoft 365 apps. All metrics focus on unlicensed users and support export functionality for further analysis. User-level information is anonymized by default. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Setting to pin M365 Copilot app to Windows taskbar
item.description:
This feature allows Global and Intune administrators to pin the M365 Copilot app to the Windows taskbar, providing users with easy access to M365 Copilot capabilities like Chat, Search, Agents, Notebooks and Create. This setting applies to all Intune-managed Windows 10 and 11 devices with the app installed. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: M365 Copilot Billing and usage - Budget limits
item.description:
Admins can set up budget limits for Copilot Pay-as-you-go by defining billing policies scoped to departments or groups. These policies can be assigned to specific Copilot services, such as M365 Copilot Chat or SharePoint-based agents, and configured with budget thresholds and alerting rules. Email notification alerts (soft alerts) are supported, enabling proactive cost control. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights: Copilot Business Impact Report
item.description:
A new Power BI report helping you explore the relationship between Copilot usage and KPIs from your business data. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: new scenarios enabling in Microsoft 365 Monitoring
item.description:
Microsoft Entra monitoring in Microsoft 365 admin center’s Service Health Dashboard is updated with additional organization level monitoring. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI: Additional permissions for AI roles
item.description:
New roles added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI that are customized to accessing AI data. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI: Web Search Query
item.description:
Within Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI, AI interactions can be filtered to show interactions that contain a web search query and the contents of the web search query are shown. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI - M365 Copilot view
item.description:
Within Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI, a specific page is dedicated to showing protection capabilities and usage for M365 Copilot. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on emails with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention (DLP) is extended to preventing Microsoft 365 Copilot from processing emails with sensitivity labels. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in emails as enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the labeled emails in Microsoft 365 Copilot chat experiences. This feature only works for emails on or after 1/1/2025. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Admins can easily manage orphaned agents with comprehensive lifecycle functionality
item.description:
Admins will have the power to effectively manage the lifecycle of ownerless agents. They can easily filter, identify, block, or delete agents that are no longer associated with an owner, ensuring a streamlined and efficient workflow. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Authoring with M365 Copilot
item.description:
Viva Pulse authors can now work with M365 Copilot to add a question, rewrite a question, and create a survey from scratch to quickly create and send their surveys to their teams to collect feedback. M365 Copilot can seamlessly capture the author's needs to recommend survey questions that fit their unique scenario. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
item.description:
This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
item.description:
A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Data Loss Prevention- Gain DLP policy insights with Security Copilot
item.description:
Copilot for Security in DLP can summarize DLP policies. This enhancement enables DLP admins to gain insights on coverage of policies viz. location, classifiers and notifications, and more. DLP admins can get these insights on all the policies or on few selected policies. They will be able to use prompts to gain deeper level view of how a policy is configured for their digital landscape. This helps them align their data posture on a regular basis and make corrections to policy posture as needed. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Integrated apps and Copilot extensions
item.description:
The Teams app usage report will be renamed to the Integrated Apps usage report and redesigned with new metrics and charts. These will provide insights into apps enabled for Teams, Outlook, Microsoft 365 apps, and Microsoft 365 Copilot (Copilot extensions) in your organization. The report will feature two sections: App Usage and User Activity. Insights will be organized by Publishing Type (Line-of-business apps, Microsoft partner apps, and Microsoft apps), Host Product (Teams, Microsoft 365 app, Outlook, Copilot), and Platform (Desktop, Mobile, Web). Additionally, the report will include views of app and user details. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
item.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites. Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal - Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Microsoft 365 Copilot retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
item.description:
Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Microsoft 365 Copilot interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats.
