This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows Backup for organizations in Intune
item.description:
Windows Backup for Organizations will be generally available in Intune with controls for backing up and restoring backups in OOBE. Backup and restore experience of user settings, especially for enterprises transitioning to Windows 11.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: M365 Copilot - Billing and usage - Usage insights
item.description:
As you enable M365 Copilot Chat pay-as-you-go billing, AI administrators can view usage insights to inform agent management decisions. This feature displays the cost and number of messages in total and per agent. Cost and usage details can be filtered by billing policy and date range.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Endpoint Privilege Management Virtual Account Support
item.description:
EPM will introduce a per-rule option to run elevated apps with the original user's identity context, preserving app data, save locations, and preferences. This offers a more personalized app runtime experience compared to the default virtual account.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Updated Clipchamp video start page
item.description:
The Clipchamp start page new unified hub is a revamped video hub start page experience of a single video destination for creation, discovery & consumption.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: The Next Generation of File & Folder Sharing
item.description:
We're now introducing the third generation of the Microsoft 365 sharing experience designed to make collaboration simpler, smarter, and more secure by default. At the heart of this update is the new hero link, a single, powerful link that controls access to your files. Whether you copy a link, share via email, or send the URL from your browser, you now have a seamless and consistent way to share and stay in control of your files.
GA date: April CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Operational dashboard to gain insight on EPM status and elevations.
item.description:
The dashboard focuses EPM insights on rollout status as well as elevations in the environment and suggestions for new rules to create.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places Management portal
item.description:
Places Admins can use a user-friendly interface to manage their Places directory data such as create, view and edit buildings, floors, sections, rooms and desks. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Data Compliance to support Generative AI Applications
item.description:
Detection, processing and storage of interactions done on Enterprise AI and AI applications such as Security Copilot, Copilot Studio and others under Microsoft Purview Data Compliance solutions including Data Lifecycle Management, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance will begin using a pay-as-you-go pricing model on May 1 in preparation for general availability. Microsoft Purview Audit will only use pay-as-you-go pricing for audit logs related to non-Microsoft Enterprise AI and AI applications. Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat data (with or without a Copilot license) will not be impacted by these new pay-as-you-go meters. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (for example SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
item.description:
Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: New enrollment policies experience for iOS/iPadOS ADE
item.description:
These enrollment policies for iOS/iPadOS contains enrollment time grouping, improved UI, and removes automatic deployment of the Company Portal app and deprecated settings.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Automated device enrollment without user affinity for visionOS and tvOS
item.description:
Support for visionOS and tvOS through automated device enrollment for userless enrollment with Microsoft Intune Suite including Intune Plan 2
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Managed device attestation for iOS/iPadOS and macOS device enrollment and ADE
item.description:
Intune is bringing ACME and managed device attestation support for eligible Apple devices to GA. This includes device enrollment and ADE enrollments, including AC2. This applies to new enrollments with device enrollment (BYOD) and new enrollments with ADE or Apple Configurator tool.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
item.description:
Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Updated work hours and location experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
item.description:
This update brings a new look with the daily peek: click on your work location icon at the top of your calendar to change your work location, view who else will be in the office, or receive suggestions to help optimize your work day. This feature will come to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Your work location will reflect across Microsoft 365, such as in Teams and your profile card. You can also update your location from Teams which will stay in sync with Outlook. We are also introducing a new location type, out-of-office, which will automatically sync with your out-of-office calendar appointments. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Discovery of sensitive data sharing to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the discovery of sensitive files and text shared to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer. This capability is based on integration with 3rd party network partners (with data being captured via network layer). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Generative AI apps activities as triggers in IRM
item.description:
With this update, the generative AI apps indicators will be supported as triggers in Risky AI usage policy. With triggers, customers can define the conditions for bringing the user into the scope of a policy while the generative AI apps indicators are used to determine risk score. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.140 - HTTPS First Mode
item.description:
HTTPS-First Mode in Microsoft Edge automatically upgrades HTTP connections to HTTPS when possible. If a site doesn’t support HTTPS, Microsoft Edge shows a warning to highlight the security risk. This appears only for public sites—not private ones or manually entered HTTP URLs. Users can enable the warning in edge://settings and admins can control availability to this feature using the HttpsOnlyMode policy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Chat] Email attachment summarization (Classic Attachments)
item.description:
Now users will be able to reason over attached content along with the body of the email in Copilot Chat. Supported file types are Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pdf, Text, Json and Xml attached to the email (Classic Attachments).
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v. 140 - Tab Groups – Auto-Save and Easy Revisit
item.description:
Microsoft Edge now automatically saves tab groups, making it easier than ever for users to pick up where they left off. Organized tab groups are preserved and ready to revisit anytime, whether a user is switching tasks or restarting the browser. Admins can control the availability of the feature using the “SyncTypesListDisabled” policy with the “openTabs” data type.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use ContextIQ file suggestions in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Instead of uploading a file, users can quickly include a file in their prompt as a reference by typing '/' and selecting one from the ContextIQ menu. This feature applies to users without a Microsoft 365 Copilot license (Copilot Chat users) and to users with a license (Microsoft 365 Copilot users) when they are toggled to web scope in chat.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Apps: Cloud Update
item.description:
The Cloud Update feature will transition to General Availability. Admins can manage monthly updates for Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise using our automation services.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-apps/admin-center/cloud-update
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.140 - Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
item.description:
Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
item.description:
This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
item.description:
This feature enables Glint Admins to assign custom access to Surveys, Focus Areas, and Administration in bulk using Roles. Access can be tailored further by defining filter populations within the Role.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management: Data Security Investigations integration
item.description:
Launch a pre-scoped Data Security Investigation (DSI) from an IRM case. When a data security admin identifies a risky user who needs deeper investigation, they can launch a pre-scoped investigation directly from an IRM case, allowing them to view content analysis related to that user and better assess post-incident data impact. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft Managed storage)
item.description:
With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage - the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, selecting storage in policy workflow.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize email with Copilot chat in Outlook
item.description:
Users without a Microsoft 365 Copilot license can now easily summarize emails in a single click, using Copilot chat. Users must have access to Copilot chat and pinning enabled to utilize. This change is coming to both Classic and New Outlook for Windows #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared spaces insights in the Pro Management portal
item.description:
The new shared spaces insights page in the Pro Management portal provides IT with customized utilization insights, including time-series data visualizations, for shared spaces beginning with Teams Rooms. The feature uses calendar data and occupancy signals from Teams Rooms to track usage with filters for location, business hours, days of the week, and date ranges making it easy to see how spaces are being used. Future updates will include desk and BYOD room spaces. Available with a Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot Support for 1:1 and Group Calls on Teams Phone Devices
item.description:
Enhance your calling experience with Copilot on Teams phones devices—access intelligent insights during calls using suggested prompts.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Your AI assistant in the DoD environment
item.description:
Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot your AI assistant for work in the DoD environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot is available in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app (web), Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Copilot Prompt Gallery.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Threads in channels
item.description:
Threads in channels allow you to start a side conversation within a channel and focus on specific topics while keeping the main conversation clutter-free. You can reply to specific messages and create a separate thread, helping to minimize distractions and foster better collaboration.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Summarization in Edge for Business Context Menu
item.description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce a Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat summarization menu item to our context menu. This feature will help users quickly unpack and ask questions about their open page.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Pages in Government Clouds
item.description:
This brings the editable Copilot Pages feature which is already shipped WW to the government environment. The pages feature enables users to add their Microsoft 365 Copilot responses to a page where they can edit and share with others for collaboration. This happens right within the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Pronoun Awareness in Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot will soon use pronouns from user profiles when responding, creating a more personalized interaction for users.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
item.description:
After further review, this feature needs to roll back. We apologize for any inconvenience. We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-admin change notifications for Microsoft 365 Backup
item.description:
Set of pre-defined administrators can be configured to receive email notifications for any potentially damaging changes to the backup settings or actions taken to ensure proper oversight of the tool in the organization.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Autopilot device preparation for Windows 365 Frontline shared general availability
item.description:
Admins can use Windows Autopilot device preparation to provision their Windows 365 Frontline shared devices.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: New Microsoft 365 Copilot Skills for SharePoint Administration
item.description:
We’re excited to announce two new Copilot skills in the SharePoint Admin Center: 1. Step-by-Step Task Guidance Copilot can now walk you through the exact steps required to complete common admin tasks. Example: “How can I find sites that are potentially over-permissioned?” What to expect: Copilot will recommend clear, sequential instructions to guide you from start to finish. 2. Multi-Criteria Site Search Copilot can help you find sites using multiple conditions at once. Example: “Find sites that have been inactive for more than 60 days and are shared externally.” What to expect: Copilot will generate a filtered list of sites that meet your criteria and suggest recommended actions.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Backup Activity Logs
item.description:
In product monitoring logs to track all activities related to backup policy configuration & restore related tasks. This will help admins with troubleshooting, monitoring, reporting and auditing capabilities.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Filtering Conversation History
item.description:
We’re introducing a chat history filtering capability that empowers users to tailor their view of past conversations. This feature enables users to scope their chat history to a more relevant, workflow-aligned view, helping them quickly surface the chats that matters most. This enhancement is designed to support better context recall.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Compact Notification Size
item.description:
Users will now have the ability to change the size of Teams notifications. The compact size takes up less space on the user's screen and offers a clean, minimalist design.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Autoplay videos in Engage (Muted)
item.description:
Muted Autoplay for Videos in the Engage Feed. As you scroll, videos will start playing silently—captions on, sound just a click away. Admins can enable or disable the feature for their organization.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Monitor DNS resolution failures and impact of proxy on Teams meetings with Best practice configurations dashboard in Teams admin center.
item.description:
Teams administrators can use the Best practice configurations dashboard in Teams admin center for monitoring significant impact on meeting quality in their tenant due to DNS resolution failures or proxy (local or cloud).
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New audit logs for Give control, Take control, and Screensharing
item.description:
IT administrators will now have the ability to access detailed logs for both the "Give and Take Control" and "Screenshare" features. These logs will provide comprehensive information, including the names and timestamps of the individuals involved in each action. Specifically, the logs will indicate who initiated or received control, as well as who started the screenshare session, along with the corresponding timestamps and names. This enhancement ensures greater transparency and accountability for all control and screenshare activities. Accessible in Teams Admin Centre.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can generate an audio overview of your meetings
item.description:
Copilot can generate an audio overview of your transcribed meetings, transforming one or multiple meetings into an engaging listening experience. Users can choose how they want to listen: select one or two speakers, adjust the tone from concise to playful, and tailor the length. This capability is only available in English currently.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams Chat and channels experience in Education
item.description:
The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more. This is an optional opt-in experience.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - New options for desk mode configuration
item.description:
Desks can now be configured for different modes, depending on the immediate needs of the Places administrator; configurations can be changed at any time. Available desk modes include: Offline (the desk cannot be booked by anyone, also default for individual desks); Assigned (individual desks can be assigned to specific users); Bookable (the desk can be booked, subject to availability/available capacity and configured policies; and Walk-up (the desk can only be booked in person and requires the user to be physically present at the desk, subject to availability/available capacity and configured policies). #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Jump to a row in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
We're making it possible to jump to a row in the Message List by typing. For example, while sorted by "From", you'll be able to type "Philip" to jump to the first row where the sender is "Philip". #outlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint – Compress your PDF
item.description:
OneDrive for Web now lets you reduce PDF file size with compress feature. You can choose from three different compression levels that best fit your needs.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Specify who has control of production tools in Teams Town hall
item.description:
Following further review, this feature started rolling out in July 2025. A new option in Town hall lets organizers designate who has control of production tools during the event. Organizers can select specific individuals who will be able to start the event, manage what attendees see, and end the event, ensuring a smoother and more organized event experience. Available on Teams desktop app and coming soon for Teams Rooms on Windows.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Detect sensitive content that's being shared in meetings (Premium)
item.description:
Screen content shared during a meeting is protected by detecting sensitive content and alerting the presenter and organizers when it appears.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Face recognition in Teams Rooms on Windows with Cloud IntelliFrame
item.description:
If facial recognition is enabled in organization policies and you've enrolled your profile via Teams Settings, Teams Rooms on Windows using Cloud IntelliFrame will recognize you, list you in the meeting roster, and optimize camera views for participants making hybrid meetings feel like you are all in the room together. This feature available with Teams Rooms Pro.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Moderator-Governed Meetings for Information Barrier Compliance (Premium)
item.description:
This new Microsoft Teams Meeting feature enables secure collaboration between users separated by information barriers (also known as ethical walls) under strict compliance oversight. With this capability, meetings involving participants from restricted groups can proceed only when a designated meeting moderator—assigned by the compliance department—is present. If the last moderator leaves the meeting, the meeting automatically ends. This ensures real-time compliance monitoring and maintains regulatory integrity during sensitive cross-barrier interactions.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: DVR (Digital Video Recording) capabilities for town halls on iOS and Android
item.description:
Users can now interact with an instance of a live streaming town hall instance in the same way they would a recorded piece of content when viewing via iOS and Android. DVR functionality in town hall enables event attendees to pause and move forward or back within a town hall, navigate to any previously-streamed timestamp, and other abilities that make interacting with a town hall more convenient and makes it easier to digest the content being presented. This feature is available for all town halls regardless of the license assigned to the organizers.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded and enhanced peripheral support for BYOD spaces
item.description:
With room and desk peripheral support expanded to include docking stations and webcams, Teams users can seamlessly connect and utilize audio and video peripherals for enhanced experiences in bring your own device (BYOD) spaces. IT admins can benefit from automatic association of devices to a space, device inventory, and detailed reports for peripherals in the Pro Management portal. Reports in the Pro Management portal require a Teams Shared Devices license for the room, and reports for desks are in public preview.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New Teams calendar available to Education customers
item.description:
The new calendar in Teams will be available to Education customers. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, the new Teams calendar will be enabled by default, and users can turn it off from the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: SharePoint eSignature for Microsoft Word
item.description:
This feature is available to tenants that enable SharePoint eSignature in the Microsoft Admin Center and have Word clients on the Current Channel.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/syntex/esignature-overview#regional-availability
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Group-less campaigns in Viva Amplify
item.description:
We are streamlining the campaign management experience in Viva Amplify and campaigns will no longer be tied to M365 groups. As such, M365 Group admins will no longer be a required role to configure Viva Amplify and only SharePoint admin role will be required. Also, when you create a campaign, there will no longer be a campaign channel tied to the Viva Amplify campaign, simplifying the campaign creation experience.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams chat and channels experience in GCC High and DoD
item.description:
The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams chat and channels experience in GCC
item.description:
The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Personal meeting templates (Premium)
item.description:
Personal meeting templates enable users to pre-save meeting configurations (meeting options) and schedule meetings quickly with one click.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-Time Text in Teams Meetings and Calls
item.description:
Real-time Text (RTT) is a fast, accessible, and immediate communication method that transmits text character by character as it is typed. It is particularly valuable in various calling and meeting scenarios where it enables deaf and hard-of-hearing individuals, neurodiverse users, and those with speech-related disabilities to engage in real-time conversations through text.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall concurrent attendees increase to 100,000
item.description:
Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audience in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 100,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 50,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 100,000 concurrent attendees by selecting the Max Capacity limit to be as high as desired up to 100,000. Reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption) is recommended for every event. This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
item.description:
Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can enable transcription in multilingual meetings (Copilot and Teams Premium)
item.description:
We’re introducing a new organizer-level control that no longer requires all meetings to have one common spoken language to be set across all participants. Meeting organizers with Copilot or Teams Premium licenses will see a new control in meeting options called “Enable multilingual speech recognition.” When this is enabled before a meeting, each meeting participant will be able to set their own spoken language during the meeting, and the meeting transcript can accurately reflect each participant’s language of choice.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
item.description:
Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
item.description:
Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-Time Mic Volume Indicator for Teams Meetings
item.description:
Introducing the Mic Volume Indicator for Teams meetings, a feature designed to provide real-time visual feedback on your audio levels. Positioned on the user bar, this indicator ensures your voice is captured correctly, eliminating the need to ask, “Can you hear me?” By offering continuous visual confirmation, it enhances user confidence and reduces communication breakdowns. It l streamlines meeting efficiency by minimizing interruptions and ensuring seamless communication.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
item.description:
When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Short meeting URL
item.description:
We are making meeting URL shorter and removing unnecessary symbols/info from there to make it more convenient for sharing
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC High environments (Premium)
item.description:
Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
item.description:
After further review, this needs to roll back. We apologize for any inconvenience. We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Newsletters
item.description:
Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: OCR Audit logs
item.description:
This feature is designed to provide Audit logs for each OCR transaction; this feature is only available in Exchange and teams workload for public preview.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Application Control for Business
item.description:
Application Control for Business in Intune has built-in controls and XML upload of WDAC policies and now supports targeting Managed Installer to specific groups instead of the entire tenant.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use Copilot in PDFs within the Microsoft 365 Copilot mobile app
item.description:
Use Copilot with PDF files for summaries and key insights.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds
item.description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint admin can enable Copilot for the Company admin user role
item.description:
Viva Glint's Company Admin role currently prevents editing of any role permissions, including feature controls for survey program reporting. While this restriction helps prevent accidental disruption of critical admin capabilities, it has emerged as a significant barrier to Copilot adoption. Customers must create and maintain redundant custom roles solely to enable Copilot access for Company Admin users, adding unnecessary complexity to deployment and ongoing management. This feature update will allow Company Admins to enable Copilot for themselves at the Viva Glint client user role level via a new toggle in General Settings. This enables Copilot across all eligible recurring and ad-hoc survey programs without altering the permissions architecture of the Company Admin role at the program level. All existing Company Admin user role permissions remain locked to preserve critical admin safeguards. This targeted change preserves essential admin role safeguards while removing a key friction point in Copilot deployment.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Learner Record Sync (LRS) logs
item.description:
Sync logs in the Viva Learning admin tab with information about assignment and completion-related ingestion errors.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Protection unit-level offboarding for Microsoft 365 Backup
item.description:
Ability to permanently delete, after appropriate grace period, protection units from the backups. A protection unit is defined as a OneDrive Account, SharePoint site, or Exchange Online shared or user mailbox being protected in the Backup tool.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows Quality Update management policies
item.description:
Manage individual Windows quality updates including non-Security and out of band updates. Choose which update types to automatically approve and the rollout options for those approvals.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026

item.title: Excel: Formula completion with Copilot in Excel
item.description:
This feature leverages AI to autocomplete the user's formula upon typing the '=' sign. It provides context-based suggestions, streamlining the formula creation process by offering intelligent and relevant completions.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Unified Conversations (Chat History) List
item.description:
We’re making it easier to find what you need. This change will mean that users now see a single, streamlined list of all your conversations. No more switching between tabs or wondering where to look for specific conversations. Just select a conversation and you'll pick up in the same context and mode as where you left off.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Confidence level filtering in Content Explorer Cmdlet
item.description:
With this feature, we will be providing confidence information in content explorer cmdlet export along with the capability to filter results on the basis of confidence level
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Onboard to the Places Directory with AI
item.description:
Seamlessly onboard to the Places Directory by using a new and improved AI-powered Initialize-Places PowerShell script. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Hunting on Teams Messages
item.description:
We are introducing three new Advaned Hunting tables designed to facilitate hunting of Teams messages containing URLs within your organization.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): SharePoint agent web part
item.description:
SharePoint site page authors can add SharePoint agents to their pages with an agent web part, allowing end users to easily access and interact with SharePoint agents directly from the site pages.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse users can assign other users as delegates
item.description:
Viva Pulse users can now assign other users as delegates to create and send pulses on their behalf.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
item.description:
Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
item.description:
Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced Device Inventory for Windows Devices for Government Cloud (GCCH)
item.description:
Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Transcript-based editing in Clipchamp
item.description:
We are introducing a novel and streamlined method to quickly and accurately remove any unwanted sections from your Clipchamp projects by leveraging the transcript. With transcript-based editing, browsing text, selecting unwanted words, and removing them will remove them from the video without the need to navigate the timeline. We are looking into making video editing more productive by providing a more intuitive and straightforward editing experience.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
item.description:
Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to exclude spam and bulk emails
item.description:
Communication compliance policies will filter out bulk emails such as newsletters to help customers triage policy matches more efficiently. This will be an option for all policies in Communication Compliance. New policies will have this filtering on by default, but admins will have the option to configure as well as remove the filtering. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Collection policies impact on IRM
item.description:
With this update, Microsoft Purview will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. We recommend reviewing collection policies as they can be created by different Purview solution admins to ensure they are setup to detect the activities required by Insider Risk Management policies Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat-centered experience for creating new documents in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad
item.description:
In the Create experience in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad, users will see a chat-centered experience to create documents, enabling them to describe the document they want to create in a prompt.  
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
item.description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Generate a formula with Copilot from the grid upon "="
item.description:
Type “=” anywhere on your grid or in the formula bar and let Copilot generate formulas from natural language, making complex calculations simpler and faster.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Save an Event as a Draft on Android
item.description:
You can save a meeting as a draft on your calendar if you aren't ready to send the meeting invites. When composing an event with at least one attendee added, select dismiss and then select Save as a Draft. The draft event will show on your calendar as [Draft] along with the title of the event.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
item.description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai Language in Endpoint
item.description:
Thai Language sentences do not have spaces in between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy in EndPoint.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP support classification of Azure RMS protected Office documents
item.description:
Endpoint DLP can now classify Office files stored in Windows devices that have Azure RMS protection applied. Classification will be triggered when file is used in applications or when just-in-time classification is enabled
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams optimization in Amazon WorkSpaces
item.description:
New VDI solution for Teams introduces multimedia offloading and optimization solution for Microsoft Teams when running in Amazon WorkSpaces (Personal and Pools). Users of the WorkSpaces Client for Windows can enjoy a high-definition experience in virtual desktops, where audio/video/screensharing are offloaded to the user's device and processed by the SlimCore media engine. This entry applies to WorkSpaces only (AppStream is not supported).
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Outlook
item.description:
Organizers and co-organizers can now easily edit the details of Teams Town Hall instances. A direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page is now accessible from Outlook calendar. This enhancement brings the same seamless editing and registration management experience already available in webinar, bringing a consistent experience across all event types.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enable policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a distribution group
item.description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Dynamic watermarking is a sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
item.description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Updated Document Library User Experience
item.description:
We're updating the SharePoint document library experience to more closely align with the user experience in OneDrive - while making it easier than ever before to access the valuable functionality unique to document libraries. When you’re working in a document library, we’ve brought custom views and filters front and center – just like in OneDrive. We’ve also redesigned the command bar to help you take action, faster. All your view customization tools are now grouped under one simplified menu, making it easy to apply conditional formatting or organize items by metadata in seconds.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Save an audio overview from Copilot Notebooks to OneDrive
item.description:
Save the audio overview that you have generated within a Copilot Notebook to OneDrive so you can download or share with others.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Exchange: Exchange Online Moderation approval requests via Actionable Messages
item.description:
The Exchange Online Moderation feature gives message moderators the ability to Approve or Reject sending a moderated message to its intended recipients via a special email message form that includes Approve and Reject buttons in the Outlook Desktop or Outlook on the web toolbar. However, the ability to approve or reject a moderated message currently isn't supported on Outlook for iOS, Outlook for Android, or Outlook for Mac. With this update to use Actionable Messages for moderation approval messages, moderators with mailboxes hosted in Exchange Online will now be able to approve or reject moderated messages via all the Microsoft email clients: from Outlook for Windows, Outlook for Mac, Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android.
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
item.description:
Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New Pulse customization options
item.description:
Authors will have new options when starting surveys, including choosing to send without pre-defining an audience, and feedback can instead be gathered by sharing a link that people can access the survey and respond through, sending a survey without a specified end date, allowing for longer-term data collection and multiple responses from recipients over time, and collecting identified responses, where answers are attributed to the person who submitted them.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Collection Policies: Scope classifiers and activity to track on all Windows devices
item.description:
Allow customers to scope classification (SITs- Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users on devices. Adding DoD/GCC/GCC high expected dates
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
item.description:
Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for endpoint. It is applicable when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhanced eDiscovery Premium APIs
item.description:
With the changes in Purview eDiscovery experience, the API support for Premium eDiscovery cases is also undergoing enhancements to align with the UI experience. We have the following APIs in Beta currently which will be moved to Live V1 version and ready for end customer use Search Estimate Statistics Search Export Report Search Export Result Search Add to ReviewSet ReviewSet Export
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Advanced label-based protection for non-Office/PDF files with the Microsoft Purview Information Protection Client
item.description:
This feature enhances secure collaboration in your organization by using the Information Protection Filer Labeler and Viewer to apply protection from Endpoint DLP. Protected non-Office/PDF files preserve their native file format on-device and can be opened in third party applications. On egress from the machine, these files are protected as PFILEs.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academy auto-save and drafting functionality
item.description:
Changes you make to new, draft, or published LPs are now saved automatically in the background. In addition, your updates are now saved in a draft state while editing a published LP until you are ready to publish. The live version stays untouched until you hit publish.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Select camera in pre-join and during meeting
item.description:
Users can select an internal or external camera, or keep it turned off, before joining or during Teams meetings.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to export policy settings
item.description:
Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
item.description:
New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Engage content surfacing in Copilot results
item.description:
Community discussion posts from Viva Engage will surface in Copilot results.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Bring your own detections
item.description:
Allow customers to bring their own user activity indicators from homegrown, SIEM/UEBA platforms, or other line-of-business applications, and leverage them in existing Insider Risk Management playbooks. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: June CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
item.description:
From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] View Index browser, schema and errors for Custom Connectors on MAC
item.description:
View index browser, schema, and the errors for custom connectors from the M365 Admin center for better troubleshooting.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Enable policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a distribution group
item.description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Sharing with Copilot summary - Now supporting PowerPoint, Excel, PDFs, Images, and protected files
item.description:
The ability to include a Copilot summary when sharing a file now extends beyond Word web to cover PowerPoint (web), Excel (web), PDF, image and text files in OneDrive Web, SharePoint document libraries, and M365 File Viewer. You can even summarize protected or confidential files, preserving your sensitivity labels while getting instant overviews. These enhancements broaden your sharing toolkit, accelerate collaboration and keep your data secure.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Read-only access to contacts within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read contacts within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Device clean up rule
item.description:
This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes and Loop Components for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
item.description:
Teams Notes and Loop components are now available in Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments, enabling real-time collaboration in chats and meetings. Loop components allow users to co-author tables, action items, and lists directly in chats, while Collaborative Notes let meeting attendees co-create and collaborate on their meeting agendas, notes, and action items. As Loop components, these features stay up-to-date across all shared locations, and assigned tasks automatically sync with Microsoft To Do and Planner for seamless task management.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Sort by category
item.description:
This adds the ability to sort by category in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
item.description:
Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Support for PowerPoint live within Cloud Video Interop (CVI)
item.description:
This new functionality will provide CVI Partners with the ability to display still images when PowerPoint live content is being presented within a Microsoft Teams meeting. The PowerPoint presentation will then be displayed as video content, this will not include animations or embedded videos.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
item.description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
item.description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Collection policies support in IRM
item.description:
With this update, IRM will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. For device indicators based IRM policy, required collection policies will be automatically created in the background. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Unattended Remote Help for Windows - Remote Sign-in
item.description:
Remotely access devices over the cloud without requiring end user involvement by signing in with credentials.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Copilot users will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments in classic Outlook for Windows.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Organizers reply privately to individuals
item.description:
Allows Engage event organizers to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies in Exchange
item.description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail
GA date: August CY2026

item.title: Updated Admin Controls
item.description:
Admin controls have been updated for enterprise customers to better manage the new unified video experience, onboarding new admin policies that allows admins to manage video creation and distribution features across platforms.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
item.description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - User accessible recycle bin for Loop workspaces
item.description:
When users delete a Loop workspace, owners can restore it from a recycle bin in Loop.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin usage reports for Loop
item.description:
View and monitor Loop usage in the tenant through existing M365 admin usage dashboards.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Graph API support for directory objects
item.description:
Microsoft Places will now support Graph API to allow CRUD (Create, read, update and delete) operations on Places directory objects. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Shared with Me Settings page
item.description:
New Settings page will give users details on the permissions they have for Shared folders and mailboxes they have added in the new Outlook for Windows and web.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description:
The broader Microsoft 365 Copilot team are working on supporting 6 new languages across all M365 Copilot features. These are (in alphabetical order) Albanian, Filipino, Icelandic, Malay, Maltese, and Serbian (Cyrillic). The planned release of support for Kazakh language is delayed; we will provide updates as they become available
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot
item.description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot
item.description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create a PowerPoint slide from a file or prompt
item.description:
Creating impactful slides can be challenging and time-consuming. Copilot helps you quickly turn your ideas and files into a fully designed slide with content ready to edit and refine, making the presentation creation and refinement process more personalized and efficient.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
item.description:
Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
item.description:
Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
item.description:
Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Expanding access to Diagnostics to Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management
item.description:
We are expanding the access to Diagnostics beyond Global Admin to: Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Enhancements for smarter authoring
item.description:
We’ve made some exciting updates to Viva Amplify's authoring experience that will take your content creation experience to the next level. With our latest release, Copilot is now smarter and more helpful than ever, leveraging your files, like Word documents, and even meeting content, to generate high-quality communications with ease. Here’s what’s new: 1. Smarter prompt tuning We’ve fine-tuned how drafts and rewrites are handled, resulting in clearer, better-formatted output that aligns with your tone and goals. 2. Create content from files and meetings You can now use Word and Excel files, or even meeting recordings, as inputs to help generate content. Whether you're working from a doc, a spreadsheet, or a conversation, Copilot in Amplify helps you turn ideas into polished messaging. 3. Unified content generation flow We’ve migrated to a common service that brings a consistent and scalable experience across all your AI tools in SharePoint and Viva Amplify. What's more, generated content now appears in real-time, making the experience smoother and faster. These updates are part of our continued investment in delivering an intelligent, seamless authoring experience.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: SQL-like commands in the search bar
item.description:
Efficiently narrow down your search results by using SQL-like commands in the search bar. Users can quickly filter messages, files, or conversations with precise queries such as from:username, with:username or in:channel.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Updating Conversation Actions on Outlook for iOS
item.description:
Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.139 - Edge Settings Improvements
item.description:
Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Introducing a new policy that can enable/disable Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Edge for Business from showing in the toolbar
item.description:
Edge for Business will now have a dedicated policy (Microsoft365CopilotChatIconEnabled) to enable and disable Copilot in Edge from showing in the Edge toolbar.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.139 - New Autofill Personal Information Settings Configuration
item.description:
A web form field collection consent toggle will be available in Autofill settings (edge://settings/autofill/personalInfo). This will allow users to consent to Microsoft Edge collecting web form field labels (e.g., "First Name," "Email") to improve Autofill suggestion accuracy. Only field labels are collected and not user-entered data. This new setting is manageable via existing policies in Autofill (e.g., AutofillAddressEnabled, AutofillMLEnabled). AutofillAddressEnabled is the parent setting for AutofillMLEnaled. The AutofillMLEnabled policy is the parent of this new setting, thus turning off the AutofillMLenabled policy will turn off this setting.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
item.description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Browse Conversation Files
item.description:
This feature makes it easy for users to find and access all files within a conversation thread. Instead of scrolling through each message to locate attachments, users can quickly view and manage all files in one place, accessed from the top of the conversation.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Inclusive meeting enhancements for sign language users
item.description:
Sign language users will benefit from an enhanced meeting experience. Interpreters will be clearly identified in the participant roster and visually distinguished throughout meetings. Deaf and hard-of-hearing participants who use sign language will be automatically detected and elevated to active speaker status, ensuring equal prominence with spoken audio participants. This will help create a more equitable and collaborative environment for everyone.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Attachments preservation for users on hold
item.description:
Enables cloud attachment preservation for users put on infinite hold so that file versions shared are preserved across any OneDrive or SharePoint site. This is a new capability which is different from the existing capability of applying label to cloud attachments and links present in OneDrive and SharePoint and shared in Exchange, Teams, Viva Engage and Copilot
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: May CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for Workday
item.description:
Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
item.description:
Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2022

item.title: Exchange: New Message Trace in Exchange Online
item.description:
Admins can access the new Message Trace and its capabilities by default when navigating to the Exchange admin center > Mail flow > Message Trace. Admins can also leverage the new Message Trace PowerShell cmdlets Get-MessageTraceV2 and Get-MessageTraceDetailV2. We have added key improvements such as support to query up to 90 days of historical data for message trace summary report (near real-time query), subject search capability, and more.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Event Updates
item.description:
