If an organizer updates an event that you have been invited to, you will now see Event Updated in the email and the updated location if applicable.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint - Apply watermark to PDF
item.description:
OneDrive for Web now lets you add text or images as watermarks to your PDF documents. You can place the watermark in front of your content and choose the perfect location and angle for it.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you connect your asset library, hosted with Templafy, to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
item.description:
Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365: Perform granular file-level restore using Microsoft 365 Backup
item.description:
Perform file-level browse/search and then restore using Microsoft 365 Backup. With this enhancement you will be able to browse for files across in a site from available daily restore points and apply filters to narrow results, restore at the original location by overwriting existing content or to a new place by creating a copy of the content.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now supports more file types in search grounding.
item.description:
We are expanding the file types supported in Copilot Chat to align with the Microsoft Search experience.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat for EDU customers ages 13 and older
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 EDU users ages 13 and older who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. Admins must take action to enable access.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New email indicators to alert on exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public domains or self
item.description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management. 1. Sending email with attachments to free public domains - This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 2. Sending email with attachments to self - This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Interpreter agent available in Teams
item.description:
The Interpreter agent enables real-time interpretation in Teams meetings in up to nine languages so each participant can speak and listen in the language of their choice. Meeting participants can also opt-in to have Interpreter simulate their personal voice for a more inclusive experience.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Timeline view of user activity
item.description:
This feature offers a comprehensive timeline view of a user's potentially risky interactions that may result in a data security or compliance incident. It includes both interactions with other users and generative AI applications that have been flagged for review. This empowers reviewers by providing context on the user's history, enabling them to address violations with a complete view of all other potential risky interactions that may result in a data security or compliance incident. As a result, reviewers can make informed decisions, streamlining the review process to be both efficient and effective.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Ability to copy attachments that are not links
item.description:
When this rolls out, customers will be able to copy and paste attachments that are not links only in supported locations without having to save to device or cloud storage.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Office 365 CDN in SharePoint
item.description:
Use Office 365 Content Delivery Network (CDN) to host static assets to provide better performance for your SharePoint Online pages.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Find on Page in Microsoft Edge for Business will soon be integrated with Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat to Find on Page (CTRL+F). This feature seeks to help users more easily find relevant content and save time.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Advanced label-based protection for all files on devices
item.description:
Turning this feature on will allow users to work on files, including files other than Office and PDF files, with sensitivity labels that apply access control settings in an unencrypted state on their devices. Endpoint DLP will continue to monitor and enforce access control and label-based protection on these files even in unencrypted state and automatically encrypt them before they’re transferred outside from a user’s device. This feature is supported only on Windows devices.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap can be shared via link
item.description:
Meeting participants can now share a link to the meeting recap from the meeting thumbnail in chat and the recap tab, making it easier to reference and share the meeting recap insights with others. Meeting participants can share the meeting recap link with anyone in their organization, for those users who don't have access to the recording or transcript, they need to request recording and transcript access before they can access the meeting recap.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Metrics reporting via Data Export
item.description:
Enterprises can get aggregate metrics on Academy, Content consumption, and user clicks.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Collaborate on SharePoint pages and news with co-authoring
item.description:
Multiple authors can collaborate on a SharePoint page or news at the same time.

GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Copilot Studio agent report in Insights enhanced with autonomous agents.
item.description:
Enhancement to Copilot studio agents report (Viva Insights) - 1. Inclusion of agents with "generative" orchestration 2. Autonomous agent adoption and impact (maker led time and cost saving).
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Update document sections from new sources
item.description:
Easily refresh parts of your document using content from other files—without copying and pasting. Copilot keeps your formatting intact while pulling in the latest updates from new sources.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Copilot chat in a sidebar in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
We're introducing a sidebar experience for Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows. Now, you'll be able to chat with Copilot alongside and in the context of the content you're reading or writing in Outlook.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
item.description:
Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Word: Email Notification Context Previews for Files Protected with Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Notification emails for mentions, tasks, comments, and replies will now contain context previews even when the source document is encrypted, and the email will inherit the document's security policies.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Real-time policy tuning analysis
item.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time policy alert prediction based on the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention -- Always-on diagnostics for macOS endpoints (Phase 1)
item.description:
This feature release ‘Always-on diagnostics’, captures critical diagnostic data from onboarded endpoint devices running on macOS for EDLP issue reporting. Comprehensive trace logs will be automatically recorded and stored locally on onboarded Mac devices, eliminating the need to reproduce issues when submitting investigation requests to Microsoft. It allows for the collection of detailed traces over extended periods (up to 90 days). While raising tickets to submit investigation requests to Microsoft regarding Microsoft Endpoint DLP, customers can share enhanced diagnostic information with Microsoft without needing to reproduce the exact scenario.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Pulse follow-ups for Glint surveys
item.description:
Empower managers and leaders to gather additional context and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey by sending a personalized Pulse that uses M365 Copilot to tailor the Pulse to the team's needs based on the Glint survey results. With Copilot-powered Pulse follow-ups, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing new IT administrator policies to control Town hall Event Access
item.description:
Previously, Microsoft did not provide a way for Teams admins to control who can attend town halls that are created in their organization. With this new policy, tenant administrators can control who can attend town halls created by members in their organization.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by departing users
item.description:
"Detects security violations by departing users near their resignation or termination date. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by priority users
item.description:
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - General Security Policy Violations
item.description:
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
item.description:
We mistakenly marked this roadmap as "launched." We apologize for any inconvenience. When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Web
item.description:
With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive web in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: SharePoint site content & policy comparison using AI
item.description:
Secure sites by identifying sites with "similar files" and identifying different policies and settings. Admin now choose a site and compare the contents with ALL other sites. The report provides a percentage on how similar the contents of the sites are and then compares the settings. This helps admin to identify and administer same/similar settings and policies to similar sites all using the power of AI.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview | Compliance Manager: Microsoft Defender for Cloud (MDC) integration
item.description:
Compliance Manager now integrates with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, allowing customers to assess their compliance posture across Microsoft 365, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon Web Services with resource-level testing and cloud-specific guidance.

GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by risky users
item.description:
Enabled by the HR 1.2 connector, this policy template detects security violations by users near a stressor event. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): See a summary from Copilot of the latest changes and comments in the Word, Excel, and PowerPoint backstage view.
item.description:
Use Copilot in the backstage view, accessible from the tile tab or start menu, to see a summary of the latest changes and comments made to your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files before opening them.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Contact Improvements on Outlook Mobile
item.description:
On Outlook mobile we are improving the "Contacts" experience by showing additional profile information for your contacts, where applicable. Secondly, this improvement hides identical duplicate contacts.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Create a meeting from an email thread with Copilot
item.description:
Copilot makes it fast and easy to schedule a meeting from an email thread. When you use the Schedule with Copilot option, Copilot analyzes the email and creates a meeting invitation for you, filling in a meeting title and agenda, and adding the email thread as an attachment. The people on the email thread are included as meeting attendees, and you can quickly review the invitation, add or change info, and then send it out.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Overview of recent comments and changes in Word, Excel, PowerPoint
item.description:
Use Copilot to see a summary of the latest comments and changes made to your Word, Excel and PowerPoint files using the Copilot chat pane.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Endpoint DLP - Protect shadow files for OneDrive
item.description:
Admins can protect OneDrive shadow files, that are not locally synced on an endpoint device. This feature has a dependency on Just-in-time (JIT) to provide the interim protection.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Improved processing status experience for Content AI models in SharePoint Online
item.description:
We’re introducing a new activity pane in SharePoint Online to help users track and troubleshoot Content AI model processing. Starting with document translation and autofill, users will be able to view real-time status (in progress, completed, failed) for individual files, bulk selections, or the full library. Completed status will include enriched details like language codes, glossary usage, and column extraction counts. This new pane will eventually replace the current “processing status” column, providing a more consistent and actionable experience.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: SharePoint agent usage statistics across all SharePoint sites
item.description:
SharePoint agents' usage statistics would be aggregated across all SharePoint sites and available for the tenant admin persona.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Report a Message for External Collaboration
item.description:
Teams users can now report security risks and concerns in external one-on-one, group and meeting chats.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- DLP alerts as indicators
item.description:
IRM admins can now select DLP alerts as indicators in IRM policies. IRM admins can select DLP policies that they would like to bring into IRM. By enabling this indicator, admins can detect if a user has alerts for the pre-selected DLP policies. When an IRM alert is generated, admin can see if there are any high-risk alerts for this user within DLP for the policies that are enabled as indicators. This feature will help admins view this information within IRM itself without having to switch to DLP. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
item.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2023

item.title: OneNote: Copilot Notebooks inside OneNote
item.description:
Users can now access Copilot Notebooks inside OneNote. Using Copilot Notebooks, users can pull together and reason over a wide range of content such as notes, documents, websites, meeting recordings, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhanced alert and user investigation using Copilot for Security in Insider Risk Management
item.description:
When investigating alerts within Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management, you can now harness the power of Microsoft Copilot for Security. This tool not only provides concise alert summaries, but it also allows you to delve into specific user activities. By doing so, you can promptly assess whether the user associated with the alert warrants further investigation or if the alert can be safely dismissed. Additionally, with just a click, you can obtain a succinct summary of the user’s risk profile, highlighting crucial details and top risk factors. Leveraging Copilot for Security streamlines investigations, ultimately reducing the triage workload and enabling faster decision making.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
item.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Delete Schema Properties via Copilot Connector APIs
item.description:
We’re adding support for property deletion in custom Copilot connectors, giving admins and developers more control over schema evolution. With this feature, you can: * Use Copilot connector APIs to delete or drop individual schema properties that are no longer needed. * Keep your connector schema clean and up-to-date without requiring full re-ingestion. * Reduce developer overhead and simplify maintenance workflows as your data models evolve.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Connector Metadata Enrichment for Custom Copilot Connectors
item.description:
We’re introducing new options that allow admins and developers to enrich their custom Copilot connectors and its schema properties with descriptive metadata. With this update, you can now: * Provide richer context about the connection and its schema properties to Copilot’s LLM, enabling more accurate and relevant responses. Add alternate names, data source categories, common actions to your connector and description for schema properties. * Improve search and chat quality by helping Copilot better understand the semantics and purpose of your data.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Simplified People Resolution for Custom Copilot Connectors
item.description:
This feature enables connectors to resolve external identities—such as email addresses or user IDs from third-party data sources—to their corresponding Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) identities. By allowing flexible identity mapping, developers can: * Simplify integration workflows without needing complex Graph API lookups. * Reduce setup friction by avoiding strict dependency on object IDs. * Improve search and chat relevance in Copilot by ensuring accurate people attribution across connected systems.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Schema Recommendations for Custom Connectors in M365 Admin Center
item.description:
Accelerate your custom connector development with intelligent schema guidance directly in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center. This feature provides: * Proposed schema suggestions tailored to the connector you’re building. * Real-time recommendations to identify gaps or errors in your schema design to help improve search and chat results in Copilot. Whether you're starting from scratch or refining an existing connector, this enhancement ensures your schema is optimized for Copilot extensibility and performance.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Full refresh of custom connectors datasource
item.description:
Admins and developers can do a full refresh or sync of their datasource for Custom Connectors using Graph APIs. This also ensures that any items deleted in the source are automatically deleted during this full sync and admins do not have to use separate delete APIs to do this.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Customize icons and display names for custom Copilot connectors
item.description:
1. Add or Customize icons for Custom Copilot connectors using the Graph API or from the M365 Admin Center. 2. Add or Customize display names for Custom Copilot connectors using the Graph API or from the M365 Admin Center.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separate Retention policies for Copilots and AI Apps
item.description:
Enable admins to configure retention policies for various Copilots and AI Apps.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Create multi-color themes for SharePoint in brand center
item.description:
We're bringing a new theme creation experience into brand center that supports multiple colors, allowing you to easily create and manage multi-color themes for your sites and related experiences.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Customize your sites with multi-color themes
item.description:
Site owners can now apply multi-color themes to their sites. These themes can be offered by Microsoft, created by the brand manager in the brand center, or by the site owners themselves using the new Site branding feature.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Import and Search function support for Sensitive service domains group
item.description:
Purview Endpoint DLP improve the management of Sensitive service domains group by allowing you to import a URL group and search specific URL across all groups.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Network share coverage and exclusion support on Mac endpoints
item.description:
With this feature, sensitive data in files stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Pop-out live captions and Real-time-Text (RTT) in meetings
item.description:
When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize live captions (including live translated captions), and real-time-text (RTT) from the main meeting window. This enables you to position the captions and RTT wherever you prefer on your screen, so you can easily focus on the meeting while viewing the incoming text in a position most comfortable for you.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
item.description:
The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Import and Search function support for Sensitive service domains group
item.description:
Purview Endpoint DLP improves the management of Sensitive service domains group by allowing you to import a URL group and search a specific URL across all groups.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Edge contextual capabilities in Business Chat work mode
item.description:
In Business Chat work mode, users can ask Copilot questions about web pages and PDFs opened in the Edge browser using page context, such as “summarize this page". This feature is currently also available in Business Chat web mode.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Outlook: New RSVP settings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
item.description:
Two new settings to improve the user experience when responding to meeting invitations: (1) do not delete invitation email after RSVPing and (2) auto-decline if the attendee's calendar shows as busy. These features will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Copilot suggests how you should RSVP to meeting requests
item.description:
Copilot suggests how users should RSVP to meeting requests, based on meeting importance, availability, and working hours. With help from Copilot, users can streamline meeting request triaging, increase the number of triaged meetings, and reduce the time required for triaging.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Prompt for permitted users to sign in to OneDrive app with personal Microsoft account
item.description:
Users have long been able to use personal Microsoft accounts with the OneDrive app on corporate Windows devices—unless restricted by admin policy. This new feature introduces a prompt only when a personal account is already signed in on the device, encouraging users to also sign in to the OneDrive app with that account. Administrators who have already restricted personal accounts on corporate devices can continue to manage this as before. Organizations that have already disabled personal OneDrive accounts on corporate devices with the DisablePersonalSync policy will not see this prompt. Administrators can also suppress it using the DisableNewAccountDetection policy. More information on configuring policies can be found here:
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/use-group-policy#manage-onedrive-using-group-policy
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Collection Policies: Scope classifiers and activity to track on all Windows devices
item.description:
Allow customers to scope classification (SITs- Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
item.description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
item.description:
Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Word: 3rd party citation add-in in reference tab
item.description:
This integrates popular third-party citation providers under the Word Reference tab, helping users efficiently complete their reference lists.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Copilot surfaces important emails in new priority view
item.description:
Copilot makes it easy to identify high-priority emails and emails that need a reply, by offering a priority view directly within your Outlook inbox.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Mail Categories
item.description:
Users will be able to assign and remove categories to mails on Android devices.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Memory
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot leverages insights inferred from conversations between the user and Copilot, along with data from the Microsoft Graph and custom instructions to provide personalized help for tasks. Users have full control and can view, manage, disable or clear memory at any time.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS app multiple managed accounts
item.description:
Allows people to use a single device with multiple managed accounts to access company information through Teams iOS app, with Outlook to follow.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Copilot Search management and insights
item.description:
Enable AI administrators to configure, customize, and measure Copilot Search across their organization. This feature provides centralized tools to manage search connectors, tailor search experiences to organizational needs, and gain actionable insights into adoption, usage patterns, and content engagement. Designed to enhance productivity and maximize the value of Microsoft 365 Copilot, it supports both setup and ongoing optimization of enterprise search experiences.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Agentic AI - powered Submissions Response for Improved Result Explainability
item.description:
We are introducing intuitive responses powered by Agentic AI for admin-submitted messages analyzed by Microsoft.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference up to 5 files when creating a presentation with Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Access SharePoint agents in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app
item.description:
Use SharePoint agents seamlessly without navigating to the SharePoint site. With this new feature, you can quickly return to your most recently used SharePoint agents directly in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced Take Action experience in Threat Explorer
item.description:
SecOps can take multiple actions like purge emails, inline submissions, and tenant level block actions together through a single Take Action wizard.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Unified experience for Copilot Dashboard and Viva Insights analyst workbench
item.description:
A new, unified experience for leaders, delegates and analysts that combines the Copilot Dashboard and advanced Copilot reports in Viva Insights analyst workbench into one application.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Minimize the compose window to multitask in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
item.description:
Outlook will help you compose emails more quickly and efficiently by allowing you to minimize your draft emails and quickly access them again from the message list or calendar view. This means that, while composing an email, you can easily get information you need from your calendar or other emails and easily get back into the draft you are working on without ever having to go to the Draft folder.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Fonts in Outlook for iOS and Android
item.description:
We heard feedback from you, our customers, and are adding support for choosing fonts while you compose in Outlook for iOS and Android. There is also improved support for fonts in the reading pane.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
item.description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Auto-update document sections from new sources
item.description:
Easily refresh parts of your document using content from other files—without copying and pasting. Copilot keeps your formatting intact while pulling in the latest updates from new sources.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.138 - Policies to manage Shadow IT
item.description:
M365 Commercial customers can use Edge polices (WebContentFilteringBlockedCategories) to block non-secure LLMs in Edge and block other browsers to redirect users to a more secure alternative like Copilot Chat.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Windows 365: Resize is enabled for Windows 365 Frontline Cloud PCs
item.description:
When changing the Cloud PC size on a specific assignment within the provisioning policy for W365 Frontline, all of the Cloud PCs in that assignment will be resized to the newly selected Cloud PC size.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Word: Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting
item.description:
Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting so that your content is seamless and fits with your document.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Name pronunciation on profile card in Outlook web and Outlook desktop
item.description:
You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Report a Conversation in new admin center
item.description:
Report a Conversation feature configuration will soon be available in the new Engage admin center, moved from the legacy Yammer admin center. This feature allows admins to set-up a reporting mechanism for Engage conversations in their network. There are no changes to the end-user experience.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily write a prompt or choose quick actions from the Copilot icon in your Word doc
item.description:
The Copilot icon in your document margin makes it easy to quickly add a prompt or choose from a range of quick options Copilot can offer.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
item.description:
Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Researcher is in Microsoft Word
item.description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot App - Ask M365 Copilot
item.description:
Right-click on your content to ask Copilot about it on Copilot PC devices.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quickly start a chat with Copilot from anywhere on your PC
item.description:
Use the Copilot key and Win + C shortcut on Windows 11 devices to quickly interact with Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
item.description:
Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create a presentation with Copilot from the PowerPoint backstage view
item.description:
You can now create a presentation with Copilot straight from the PowerPoint backstage view, accessible when you start PowerPoint or when you select the File tab.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Device and Device group-based policy scoping support for Endpoint DLP
item.description:
Currently you can create Purview Endpoint DLP policy and assign to specific users or user groups. This feature will allow you to create and release feature based on both users and machines. You can use this feature to achieve different policies for same user on different devices.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot surfaces key statistics in the top of a document
item.description:
Copilot includes a summary at the top of key statistics from your Word document.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] [b.2.3] Governance control for agents with file uploaded as knowledge source
item.description:
For agents with uploaded files as knowledge source, admins now can regulate and manage including but not limited to agent filtering, reviewing sensitivity label, metadata, etc.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Large Audience Warnings in Outlook for iOS and Android
item.description:
Users are warned when they are emailing a large number of recipients which can help them make the correct decision about wording, tone, and content.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook
item.description:
New Outlook for Windows will now support a two-click view for encrypted emails. This feature enables admins to require user confirmation before allowing access to encrypted emails. Admins can find the "TwoClickMailPreviewEnabled" setting in the Microsoft Azure directory. Alternatively, admins can access and set the value for this setting using the Microsoft PowerShell cmdlet "-Set-OrganizationConfiquration" in the Microsoft Exchange Online PowerShell. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
item.description:
Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Word: Choose the level of detail for summaries when documents are opened
item.description:
If you like brevity or more depth in the summaries that Copilot generates when you open a document, you can now specify your preference as brief, standard, or detailed.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Word: Choose the level of detail for summaries when documents are opened
item.description:
If you like brevity or more depth in the summaries that Copilot generates when you open a document, you can now specify your preference as brief, standard, or detailed.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Notify users about hidden content matches in Communication Compliance
item.description:
This feature is designed to enhance transparency by introducing a notification banner that alerts users when keywords embedded in hidden content, such as hyperlinks or encoded strings, trigger a compliance policy match. With this update, investigators will be able to quickly recognize that some or all keyword matches are not immediately visible in the main content body, saving time and ensuring a more efficient triage experience.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support on users trying to paste sensitive content into web browsers on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachment's label in Outlook on the web and New Outlook
item.description:
Outlook on the web and New Outlook will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admins can configure this either using the cmdlet set-label policy advanced setting or the Compliance portal to configure the label policy (Roadmap 100158). Customers will automatically see or will be recommended that an email gets the higher label from an attachment's label. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
item.description:
This adds the ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: search emails while offline in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to do basic search functions without internet connection or when the search service fails. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Locate your Copilot Pages in Copilot Chat navigation pane
item.description:
For quick access to your Copilot Pages, find all page artifacts created across your apps/modules in one place underneath the Chat section in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments
item.description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Note: We have updated the cloud environments to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
item.description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
item.description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide suggestions
item.description:
Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
item.description:
Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution. Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any associated printer, depending on the setup.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Entra: Improved Backup and Restore Experience for the Authenticator App on iOS
item.description:
Users of the Microsoft Authenticator app on iOS will be able to back up account names—including Microsoft work or school accounts, Microsoft personal accounts, and third-party accounts like Amazon or Google—using iCloud and iCloud Keychain. This enables secure, end-to-end encrypted backup of account names and TOTP credentials. When setting up a new iOS device, account names will automatically appear in the app, and users can sign in to complete setup.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Text Editor Copilot 'Refine' update
item.description:
SharePoint is updating the capabilities of its text editor Copilot. Now, you can not only use copilot to rewrite your existing text but also use it to keep writing or add a grounding document. By answering the question "what do you want copilot to change", you can perform any number of refinements to your existing content.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Usability and privacy improvements for live captions and live transcript in meetings
item.description:
Introducing enhancements to live captions and live transcripts in Microsoft Teams to make meetings more intuitive, accessible, and privacy-focused. Live captions are now scrollable, allowing users to review past conversation with more flexibility and over a larger surface area. Next, copying captions is disabled by default to protect sensitive information and support compliance. Additionally, the live transcript panel won’t open automatically with features that trigger transcription—like recording, giving users greater control over their layout. Lastly, If transcription is enabled, users who attempt to open the live transcript panel will see a banner suggesting they switch to live captions for real-time comprehension. These updates streamline the experience while supporting accessibility and privacy.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings
item.description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to IRM exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusions apply on both target and source file paths. 3. File path exclusions for removable media - We will start supporting file path exclusions for removable media. 4. Exclusion support for browser - Domain exclusions are now supported for browsing indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Communications Dashboard
item.description:
A central hub for corporate communicators and network administrators to access information and manage tasks across the communications lifecycle, starting with campaigns, analytics, leader and audiences, and advanced moderation.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows includes registering the new Outlook for Windows package by family name and persisting the user data in LocalAppData. It will allow the roaming of user data in new Outlook for non-persistent VDI. #newoutlookforwindows
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365-apps/outlook/get-started/virtualized-desktop-infrastructure
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
item.description:
Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
item.description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
item.description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Apply partial settings for Android devices using configuration profiles in the Teams admin center
item.description:
In the Teams admin center, admins can now modify, review, and apply configuration settings to Android devices without overriding other settings ensuring only the desired changes are made.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Dictionary
item.description:
Tenant administrators can now upload a Custom Dictionary through the M365 Admin Portal's Copilot Settings page to include tenant-specific terminologies. This enhancement improves entity recognition in Teams meeting transcripts, benefiting both Recap and Copilot's understanding of the content.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Copilot Prepare for Meeting in Calendar
item.description:
With so many of us in back-to-back meetings, it can be a real struggle to stay on top of pre-reads, action items, and even what each meeting is about. Copilot can identify and summarize the key points so you can show up prepared in just a few minutes. When you have an upcoming meeting, Copilot proactively shows you a "Prepare" button in your inbox which helps you quickly get context by creating a summary of the meeting and showing and summarizing relevant files, leveraging the power of the Microsoft Graph. Now you have all the most important details you need and can arrive prepared and ready to engage in a productive conversation. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Add custom sounds for Mail Notifications, Reactions, and Calendar Reminders
item.description:
In your Notification settings, you'll be able to add a custom sound for your mail notifications, mail reactions, and calendar notifications (aka reminders). #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Email Attachment Preview in Content Explorer
item.description:
This feature allows admins to view the attachments of an email within purview content explorer. This will help admins with their investigation process
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Time to read on SharePoint News posts
item.description:
Each news item in SharePoint will display estimated read time of the article.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
item.description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
item.description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP - Edge to enforce USB, network, and printer group restrictions on files
item.description:
Purview Admins can now use either Removable USB device, Network Share, and/or Printer groups within DLP policies, these restrictions are now extensible to the Edge browser experience.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to Insider Risk Management (IRM) exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusions apply on both target and source file paths. 3. File path exclusions for removable media - We will start supporting file path exclusions for removable media. 4. Exclusion support for browser - Domain exclusions are now supported for browsing indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
item.description:
With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness and control over the process.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
item.description:
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Keyword monitoring enhancements
item.description:
Network and Verified admins can setup specific keywords to monitor across conversations in their network. The enhancements include a new, modern experience of the existing functionality. Keyword monitoring will now accessible in the new communications dashboard experience within the advanced moderation page. The feature is no longer available in the Engage admin center.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Theme moderation in Viva Engage
item.description:
Network admins and corporate communicators can input custom themes of interest and track new conversations that match these themes. Theme monitoring is accessible in the new communications dashboard experience in the advanced moderation page.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
item.description:
This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle separate retention policies for Copilots and AI Apps
item.description:
Enable admins to configure retention policies for various Copilots and AI Apps.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for web and in Teams
item.description:
Bringing the power of Microsoft Copilot to OneNote for web and in Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
item.description:
You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Skills Scenarios for Leaders in Viva Insights
item.description:
With Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Insights, leaders can unlock powerful skills insights for their teams—driven by People Skills data. Copilot enables leaders to explore their organization’s skill distribution, identify individuals with specific capabilities, and generate dynamic visual reports to support strategic decision-making.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Hide people previewing files in OneDrive and SharePoint
item.description:
This setting will allow administrators to disable the presence feature in the OneDrive and SharePoint file previewing experience on selected sites. This item is inaccurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Update to Microsoft Syntex translation
item.description:
The document translation service enables users to create translated copies quickly and easily while preserving the original format and structure of the file. We’re updating the service to allow creating translated copies in up to 10 languages with a single request. This update will be available for both manual and rule-based requests.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Enhancing SharePoint document translation with glossary feature
item.description:
We’re thrilled to announce the addition of a glossary capability to our SharePoint AI content document translation model. This feature delivers precise, industry-specific translations, fostering unparalleled clarity and consistency for your documents. Experience effortless integration and user-friendly operation within your existing SharePoint libraries.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
item.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat response output
item.description:
Easily interact with Microsoft Graph content represented by bolder references, new action bar, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker attribution now “On” by default in BYOD rooms with enhanced admin controls
item.description:
New PowerShell setting (SpeakerAttributionBYOD in csTeamsAIPolicy), enabled by default, gives IT admins more control over speaker attribution in BYOD (bring your own device) meeting rooms. This enhances the experience for users by enabling clear speaker labels and richer in-meeting and post-meeting insights with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Users just enroll profiles via Teams Settings to be recognized.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Unified video branded start page
item.description:
This creates a unified Clipchamp and Stream start page that serves as a single video destination of creation, consumption, and discovery.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) - Support for embedded images in files including Office files in SharePoint and OneDrive
item.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) scanning enables Microsoft Purview to scan images for sensitive information. With Embedded support, OCR will scan content in DOCX, PPTX, XLSX and PDFs (scanned and hybrid containing searchable text and images). This will be in addition to support for standalone images
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI- additional Microsoft Copilot integrations
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI support for Fabric Copilot and Security Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
item.description:
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - User Schema Enhancements- Create and Edit Hierarchies
item.description:
This feature enables Viva Glint admins to create and edit hierarchies directly within the platform. It empowers admins to easily update and maintain the structure of user data without requiring support.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated UI for Microsoft 365 Copilot App
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot app is your starting place for AI at work, offering quick access to secure AI chat, search, files, and content creation in one seamless app.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for GCC
item.description:
Copilot in Excel gains powerful new insights and visualizations with Advanced Analysis. Explore your data in a natural, conversational way, while Copilot does the heavy lifting using Python, a rich programming language that supercharges what is possible in your spreadsheets.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
item.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI). Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New email indicators to alert on exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public
item.description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management. 1. Sending email with attachments to free public domains: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 2. Sending email with attachments to self: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
item.description:
The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
item.description:
