Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
item.description:
When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat general availability for GCC
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Copilot is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
item.description:
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Meeting Audit Events in GCC
item.description:
Teams Audit Events for Meetings, including MeetingDetail and MeetingParticipantDetail, will soon be available in GCC. This enhancement will provide administrators with comprehensive insights into meeting activities, helping to ensure compliance and improve operational efficiency. MeetingDetail: Captures detailed information about meetings, including start and end times, meeting subject, and organizer details. MeetingParticipantDetail: Logs participant information, including join and leave times, participant roles, and any changes in participant status during the meeting. Audit logs are accessible through the Microsoft Purview portal, where administrators can search, filter, and export audit data for detailed analysis. These logs are essential for maintaining compliance, investigating incidents, and ensuring the security of Teams activities.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot can generate an audio overview of a notebook
item.description:
Copilot can turn the referenced files in a notebook into a dynamic audio overview, transforming them into a listening experience that’s easy to follow. To generate an audio overview in Copilot Notebooks, select ‘Generate audio overview’ at the top of the notebook. This capability is only available in English currently.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI - Data Assessments
item.description:
Data assessments in Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by viewing default assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Admins can manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab in Microsoft 365 admin center
item.description:
Admins have options to manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab including agent management for IT published agents and shared agents.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: Enrich the details of the auto forwarded emails in the Exchange DLP
item.description:
We are excited to introduce an enhancement to our system that will provide more accurate and detailed information for forwarded emails. This new feature will ensure that the correct user, recipient information, and email evidence are displayed in the alert generated. This improvement will help admins accurately trace the origin and intended recipient of forwarded emails, reducing confusion and minimizing the risk of false positives. The update will be reflected in our audit logs, alerts page, and activity explorer page
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Document snapshot in Word personalizes output
item.description:
The document snapshot helps the user focus faster by surfacing the most important information for them based on their personal context.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Content suggestions in Word
item.description:
Select the Suggestions tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a Word document for suggestions on improving the content of the document.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Windows 365: Frontline in Shared mode availability for Germany West Central, Korea Central, Korea South
item.description:
Windows 365 Frontline in Shared Mode is expanding to Korea Central & Germany West Central, helping frontline workers in these regions to securely share Cloud PCs across shifts.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Priva Privacy Management – Multicloud environments
item.description:
Microsoft Priva Privacy Risk Management extends its overexposure policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create privacy policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope and Priva will automatically notify data asset owners when matches are detected.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Adaptive scopes
item.description:
Ability to target IRM policies using global Adaptive Scopes. Adaptive scopes within IRM policies allow admins to use existing adaptive scopes created on the Microsoft Purview compliance portal within IRM policies, Adaptive scopes can be created using queries to define user groups dynamically. This feature provides more powerful targeting for policies, allowing different settings to be assigned to users based on attributes from Entra ID without the administrative burden of creating and maintaining groups. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Azure Storage
item.description:
Label-based protection support is now possible for Azure Data Lake Gen 2 and Azure Blob storage, all within Microsoft Purview information Protection. You may already know how to protect Microsoft 365 data like documents or emails with sensitivity labels, and you will now be able to apply these labels and the related protections to these additional sources. In addition, you will have a consistent framework for your sensitive information by allowing your existing label scheme and extending it to apply within these sources.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Overview dashboard
item.description:
We are introducing a new Overview dashboard to help customers understand how our product effectively protects their organization environment and digital assets. The overview dashboard focuses on showcasing the effectiveness of our tools, how customers can further amplify this effectiveness and our product’s leading position in comparison to the other non-Microsoft security solutions out there.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Add cycles to a custom blank recurring program
item.description:
This feature enables Glint Admins to add cycles to programs created using the "custom blank recurring" program type. Previously unavailable, this capability is now supported for both existing and newly created programs.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
item.description:
Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
item.description:
Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Add emails as attachments while composing an email on Outlook for iOS and Android
item.description:
Now while you are composing in Outlook for iOS or Android, you can use the same attach option you already know to select and attach emails to your mail.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
item.description:
Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot
item.description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery enhancements
item.description:
We are introducing several enhancements to the eDiscovery modernized user interface. These updates include a comprehensive case-level data source view, the ability to retry failed locations for a more complete search statistics estimate. Users will also be able to duplicate search and copy search from hold or hold from search within the same case, reusing the data sources and queries. Additionally, customers will be able to access a more comprehensive reporting in all process reports including information like compliance boundary, encryption settings and more.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint storage insights, actions, and resources
item.description:
A new Storage tab will be added to usage report for SharePoint within the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new tab will provide visibility into storage quota consumption, a usage trend, and recommended actions and resources for storage management and optimization
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Labeling improvement for non-Office/PDF files using endpoint DLP
item.description:
This allows the customer to use a label for a non-Office/PDF file without productivity impact.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
item.description:
Now, with a Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) code provided in the town hall share event dialog, organizers can share these codes with presenters. With these codes, presenters will join as an attendee and promoted to a presenter to join either the green room or the live session.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
item.description:
This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Turn on optional connected experiences" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
item.description:
Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Ask Copilot questions on meeting recordings
item.description:
Select a meeting recording in your OneDrive and ask Copilot to recap the meeting, highlight parts where you were mentioned, or recommend action items and next steps. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
item.description:
Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage supports 14 more languages
item.description:
Viva Engage now supports 14 additional languages (listed below), making the platform more accessible to global users. This update allows employees to engage in their preferred language, helping improve communication across multilingual teams. Users can navigate to their settings in Viva Engage and choose their preferred language in the drop down under 'Language' settings. The new languages are - 1. Arabic 2. Vietnamese 3. Serbian (Latin) 4. Slovak 5. Croatian 6. Hebrew 7. Slovenian 8. Lithuanian 9. Estonian 10. Bulgarian 11. Latvian12. English (United Kingdom) 13. Spanish (Mexico) 14. French (Canada)
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: M365 Archive Search
item.description:
M365 Archive will introduce new search capabilities that allow end-users to easily identify archived content. This feature aims to improve productivity by making archived data searchable by end users so they can identify which site needs to be reactivated.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: M365/SharePoint Agent Insights for SharePoint Administrators
item.description:
Rich insights on SharePoint agents for content governance as part of SharePoint Advanced Management controls.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : MDM-independent support for Endpoint DLP on MacOS devices
item.description:
Endpoint DLP is extending support to MacOS devices independent of the MDM solution used to deploy (previously supported through JAMF or Intune).
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Apple and Android devices
item.description:
Gain more inventory information about your Apple and Android devices.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize visuals and pages in embedded PowerBI reports
item.description:
Analysts can now use embedded PowerBI edit tools to customize their reports to add visuals, pages and change themes, text and more, and then publish it to their organization.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Site attestation
item.description:
Site attestation policy is the newest addition to the site lifecycle management suite. It is a one-stop solution to ensure your sites are secure and compliant by reducing the risk of unmanaged sites. This involves regular reviews by site owners or admins to check and confirm the accuracy of site information, including the site's necessity, its owners, members, permissions, and sharing settings. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain unattested for more than 3 months to prevent risks of content over exposure.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot: Microsoft 365 Copilot Interaction Export API
item.description:
The new Microsoft 365 Copilot Interaction Export API enable customers and ISVs to export Copilot interaction data for processing in their security and compliance (S+C) applications. This new Interaction Export API captures the user prompts and Copilot responses in the Copilot private interactions and provide insights into the resources Copilot has accessed to generate the response. It will be available in Public Cloud for General Availability.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: AI assistant for admins in the Pro Management portal
item.description:
IT admins can optimize their time and resources by utilizing the Pro Management Portal AI assistant. It offers comprehensive answers to questions about Teams meeting spaces and management solutions and delivers data and insights specific to inventory in the organization’s environment. This feature is available with Teams Rooms Pro and does not require a Microsoft 365 Copilot license.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Discover agent in Microsoft Copilot on iOS/Android
item.description:
Agent has been released to Desktop/Web Copilot and now we are enabling Agent UX in mobile endpoints. It will allow end-users to discover installed agents, add new agents and chat with them in mobile Copilot on Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 Copilot App (formerly Microsoft 365 App).
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 App: Availability of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Government GCC-H and DoD
item.description:
The Cloud Policy service allows Microsoft 365 administrators to configure policies for Microsoft 365 apps and assign these policies using Microsoft 365 or Entra ID groups. Once configured, these policies are automatically enforced as users sign in and use Microsoft 365 apps and services. The initial release will support policies for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise on Windows and future updates will bring support for additional applications and platforms. For additional information about the Cloud Policy service, refer to "Overview of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise".
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-apps/admin-center/overview-cloud-policy
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Reply and forward emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to reply and forward emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance center: Insider Risk Management - Policy scoping enhancements
item.description:
After further review, we continue rolling this out. We apologize for any inconvenience. With this release, Insider Risk Management administrators can include or exclude specific users, groups, and adaptive scopes within policies. We are also adding support for non-mail enabled Security Groups within IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
item.description:
Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New workload for Copilot in Content Explorer
item.description:
With this change, customers will start seeing a new Copilot location within the Content Explorer. This will have all the sensitive information which is present in Copilot conversations
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
item.description:
After further review, we continue rolling this out. We apologize for any inconvenience. This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC-H and DoD
item.description:
We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC-H and DoD environments.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot advanced text analysis in Excel
item.description:
Copilot can now analyze text by identifying themes or sentiments, cite examples in the data, and insert a column with theme/sentiment labels.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
item.description:
Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
item.description:
Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
item.description:
Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
item.description:
Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
item.description:
Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Advanced editing from camera
item.description:
This aligns the capture experience in camera and editor by enabling a seamless switch to the Clipchamp editor to make videos more appealing and impactful using advanced edit capabilities.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
item.description:
In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Configurable Keyboard Shortcuts
item.description:
Set your own keyboard shortcuts to match your work preferences. Customize the keyboard shortcut for an action you frequently use by clicking on the ellipsis and selecting Keyboard shortcuts from the menu.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Pause and Resume support for printer scenarios
item.description:
Pause and Resume support for printer scenarios for customers trying to override a DLP soft warning policy tip when submitting a print job. Before this rollout, the user must reinitiate the print job for the intended result. After this rollout, the override will be stored temporarily, and the print job will execute.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: New Folder Anyone Link Permission: View & Upload
item.description:
We're introducing a new 'View and Upload' permission for folder 'Anyone' links in the OneDrive Admin Sharing Settings. This feature allows tenants to restrict folder links to 'Anyone can view' while still enabling the 'Request Files' functionality. It offers tenants more granular control over content access, ensures compliance with internal policies, and helps administrators maintain a higher level of data governance.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New question types
item.description:
Viva Pulse authors can add new question types, including matrix types, and leverage enhanced logic to drive more targeted survey experiences for respondents.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for endpoint
item.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) support will detect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply data loss prevention (DLP) policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data on your Windows endpoint devices. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP and PDF (image only PDF).

GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Support for click through rate metric in page analytics
item.description:
This release will enhance SharePoint page analytics by adding click through rate metric. A new card will show the percentage of unique viewers who clicked on a link from the news post, providing insights into user engagement with the post.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified attachment flow on Teams Mobile
item.description:
Introducing a new content picker for Teams Mobile! Attach any type of content, whether files or media, from the paperclip icon in the compose overflow menu. Our unified attach flow makes it easy and intuitive to attach content from any source location.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Reply and forward emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to reply and forward emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Group messages as conversation for PST files in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities, #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Secure password deployment in the Edge management service
item.description:
The secure password deployment feature in the Edge management service enables admins to deploy encrypted shared passwords to a set of users, allowing them to log into websites seamlessly without ever seeing the actual passwords. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and enhances the organization's overall security posture.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
item.description:
LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
item.description:
Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Custom account icons in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
Soon, you'll be able to choose a custom icon so that it's easier to tell your accounts apart while using Outlook on iOS and Android.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- OCR support in Insider Risk Management
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the scanning technique of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to detect potentially risky activities that may lead to data security incidents related to images in SharePoint, Teams messages, and endpoints. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Set New Ringtones in Teams Mobile
item.description:
This feature allows you to customize and select different sounds for various types of calls, helping you better manage your alerts and distinguish between different incoming communications. For users with Microsoft Teams Phone, this also includes calls for forwarded and delegated calls.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Simplified Input box update in Copilot Chat
item.description:
We are making it easier for users to type prompts with access to CIQ, local files, attach cloud files, and agents by adding it under the Plus Menu.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Call quality reports for BYOD rooms in the Pro Management portal
item.description:
As with Microsoft Teams Rooms, admins can now access detailed call quality reports for BYOD rooms with associated peripherals in the Pro Management portal. These reports include call history and session details that help diagnose network, audio, and video issues. Reports in the Pro Management portal requires a Teams Shared Devices license for the room.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Team's team
item.description:
Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team from the Copilot Prompt Gallery in Copilot Chat, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): People Skills is now available
item.description:
We’re excited to launch People Skills, an AI-powered service that delivers personalized skills-based experiences across Microsoft 365. Using advanced inferencing, it helps organizations identify skill gaps and promote upskilling. With People Skills, individuals can easily share a current view of their skills and more easily connect with others. People Skills data enriches people-based experiences in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in the Microsoft 365 profile card and editor.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat module UI refresh
item.description:
Copilot Chat is designed to provide a streamlined UI, making it easy to get started and achieve your goals quickly. It offers a helpful, understanding, and personalized experience, allowing you to search for past interactions, content, agents, or pages with ease.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Profile cards in the new Outlook for Windows display people details stored in PST files
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to click on a person to view their details stored in a .pst file on the profile card . Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Profile cards in the new Outlook for Windows display people details stored in PST files
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to click on a person to view their details stored in a .pst file on the profile card . Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help monitor response collection and insights
item.description:
Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need with much less effort. Copilot can create a collection plan, track your progress, and let you know when to take action with reminders and insights. Forms can notify you when early insights are ready, and you can easily continue your analysis with Copilot in Excel. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter collection and analysis.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite – Remote Help supports multi-session AVD
item.description:
Remote Help supports AVD sessions with 1 user on 1 VM today. This feature will enable support for multi-session AVD with several users on 1 VM.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity Labels for Loop Components
item.description:
Sensitivity labels for Loop components - Users can set/apply/view sensitivity labels to loop components to classify and protect content based on its sensitivity level. The labels help enforce policies such as encryption, access control, and content marking to ensure that sensitive information is handled appropriately.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Dashboard in Sites
item.description:
The dashboard layout webpart will be available on all sites and pages. Currently the dashboard webpart is limited to Home Sites, it will be extended to Team Sites and Communication Sites
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Policy sync status on Purview portal
item.description:
The Policy Sync Status feature enables solution admins to know the policy sync status directly from the Policy page in Purview portal. When a policy is created or updated by a user, the changes are distributed to the locations selected. This new feature will give users insight into whether the policy changes have reached the target locations. This policy sync status feature is available for DLP (excluding endpoint policies), Information Protection, Data Loss Management, Records Management, Information Barriers, and Priva.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Create channels with ease
item.description:
Efficiently create channels directly from the header menu, eliminating the need to scroll down to the specific team. As a channel creator, you will have the flexibility to choose from all the teams you can create a channel in to host your new channel.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Setting to toggle comma as recipient delimiter
item.description:
By default, Outlook Web and the New Outlook support separating recipients by using either a semicolon or a comma. This new setting allows users to choose if the comma should be used as a recipient separator or instead allowed as part of the contact name. This is helpful for organizations where contacts follow the "Last name, First name" format. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: On demand remediations - single device
item.description:
Remediations are script packages that can detect and fix common support issues on a user's device before they even realize there's a problem. These remediations can help reduce support calls. On demand remediations enables admins to execute a remediation on demand and as soon as possible on a single device.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: June CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced contextual discovery of agents within Microsoft 365
item.description:
Customers now have new experience to discover, install, and use/reuse agents within the Copilot app for Microsoft 365.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
item.description:
You can use Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) just-in-time (JIT) protection to block all egress activities on monitored files while waiting for policy evaluation to successfully complete. When JIT protection is enabled, and while policy evaluation is processing, Endpoint DLP blocks all egress activities for each user whose account is in the selected scope. Endpoint DLP audits the egress activities for all user accounts that have been excluded (via the Exclude setting) or are otherwise not in scope.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Sensitivity labels
item.description:
Viva Amplify will support sending mail with sensitivity.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a TXT file when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a TXT file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a TXT file when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a TXT file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a TXT file when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a TXT file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Monitoring in the Edge management service
item.description:
The Edge management service offers an overview of insights about your managed Edge instances and suggests actions you can take. For out-of-date devices, you can easily schedule updates or notify users to update their browsers to avoid workflow interruptions.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Calendar support in Online Archive
item.description:
Add calendar support in Online Archive.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: May CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
item.description:
Currently Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, Block with override. This feature will add Off and Allow. Off means Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. Customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for specific group. Allow means Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire event on Activity Explorer.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Full file evidence support for restricted apps
item.description:
Full File Evidence supports activities like Cloud egress, paste to supported browser, copy to USB, Network share, RDP, Bluetooth app. Now we are expanding full file evidence collection for unallowed apps as well.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Quick Summarizations in eDiscovery
item.description:
Introducing the "Quick Summarization" feature for eDiscovery in Purview Copilot—designed to streamline case management with an intuitive, at-a-glance overview. This new capability allows users to quickly access a comprehensive summary of eDiscovery cases, holds, and searches, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple tabs to assess status, statistics of completed actions, pending tasks, and ongoing jobs. The "Quick Summarization" feature consolidates this information into a single, easy-to-understand summary. Additionally, similar summary views are available for both Search and Hold within the eDiscovery case. Powered by existing “contextual summary” skill, the system analyzes case/search/hold metadata and generates natural language summaries, providing users with a clear, actionable overview of key details in real-time.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Hold limits increased per hold policy for eDiscovery Premium
item.description:
The Purview eDiscovery team has increased the limits for Hold policies for eDiscovery Premium in the new purview.microsoft.com portal. The maximum number of mailboxes in a single case hold has been increased from 1,000 to 2,000. This limit includes the combined total of user mailboxes and the mailboxes associated with Microsoft 365 Groups, Microsoft Teams, and Viva Engage Groups. The maximum number of sites in a single case hold has been increased from 100 to 2,000. This limit includes the combined total of OneDrive for Business sites, SharePoint sites, and the sites associated with Microsoft 365 Groups, Microsoft Teams, and Viva Engage Groups. Overall, the maximum allowed locations in a premium case hold policy in a premium case is 4,000 (2,000 each). This is possible through the new user interface in Purview portal and not through the Classic eDiscovery experience. Additionally, this is not currently possible with Graph. The maximum hold limits for a standard case remain the same as earlier: 1,000 mailboxes and 100 sites. All other settings for eDiscovery hold continue as is. Lastly, in case of license downgrade, the system won't remove any existing holds and won't allow adding more, such as for a policy with a higher number of locations in it (e.g. 1500 Mailbox and 1500 Sites), and if the case setting is downgraded to E3, you will not be able to add more locations in it based on E3 limits, but you will be able to remove locations from it.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - App Permissions for Graph API
item.description:
Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - App Permissions for Graph API
item.description:
Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage GDPR requests in Engage admin center
item.description:
You can now manage GDPR deletion requests directly within the Engage admin center, streamlining the process and reducing reliance on the legacy Yammer admin center. This update centralizes compliance actions in one modern interface.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot Notebooks Module
item.description:
Copilot Notebooks Module in the M365 Copilot App
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Create, Delete, Rename, and Move Folders
item.description:
You will now be able to more easily create, delete, rename, and move folders on mobile. From your inbox, tap the Edit icon in the sidebar. Tap on any folder to create a subfolder, or rename, move, and delete that folder. You can also rearrange and nest your folders by dragging and dropping them.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Metadata for Shared agent management in Microsoft 365 admin center
item.description:
IT admins can view metadata for Shared agents in Microsoft 365 admin center similar to metadata information for line of business applications built by customer organization. It provides IT admins the opportunity to explore all data besides honoring UX filters for a seamless user experience.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: PowerPoint: Email Notification Context Previews for Files Protected with Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Notification emails for mentions, tasks, comments, and replies will now contain context previews even when the source document is encrypted, and the email will inherit the document's security policies.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Edit from This and All Following Events
item.description:
You can now edit a recurring event from a certain date forward by selecting "This and All Following Events"
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot summary for transferred calls
item.description:
When a call is forwarded/transferred to another colleague, users can prompt Copilot to automatically summarize the context, open questions, etc. for the call as a briefing for the receiving colleague. This feature ensures that the recipient is well-informed about the previous conversations related to the transferred call, enhancing their understanding and preparedness.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Updated Work feed on the new tab page
item.description:
The Work feed experience, available on the new tab page for Work feed-eligible Commercial users with a Microsoft 365 subscription, will have changing and updated functionalities. These changes include renewed focus on productivity and Microsoft 365 modules. Users will have an updated My Feed experience on the enterprise new tab page. Users will no longer be able to view content and activity from their network and instead will experience quick access to recently used Microsoft 365 documents, recent SharePoint sites, upcoming Outlook events, Microsoft 365 apps, and Microsoft To Do tasks. Existing new tab page policies will continue to be enforced and will not be impacted by this updated Work feed experience.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-enterprise-ntp
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
item.description:
Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot Chat and Microsoft 365 Copilot - Users can insert cloud files in Copilot chat prompts.
item.description:
In the Web tab in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, users can access Microsoft One Drive or Microsoft SharePoint to find and insert cloud files in their prompts.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention – Configure network share groups using IP or IP address range
item.description:
With this feature, data officers can now configure specific IP addresses or IP address ranges in DLP Settings within Sensitive service domain groups to be used in DLP policies for more precise scoping.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Clipchamp introduces Copilot-powered video creation from a prompt
item.description:
Copilot now offers an AI-powered video creation feature in Clipchamp for work. Simply type your prompt, and Copilot will generate a bespoke script, source high-quality stock footage, and assemble a video project complete with music, voiceover, text overlays, and transitions. This provides you with a first draft, which you can edit in the Clipchamp app. You can then export the video to mp4, which will be saved in OneDrive and count towards your OneDrive quota, ready for sharing. This feature is ideal for creating informational videos, video messaging, how-to guides, demos, and video presentations. Available on the Microsoft 365 Copilot plan.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
item.description:
Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies. This includes some minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular trigger throttling
item.description:
With this update, we are introducing more granular trigger throttling limits to isolate the impact of a surge in noisy trigger volumes and prevent other policies from being affected. This ensures that organizations can receive critical alerts without being throttled by these limits. By default, the throttling limits will be applied as follows: All sensitive triggers, including HR signals, Azure AD leavers, and custom triggers, will be limited to 15,000 per day per trigger. All other triggers will be limited to 5,000 per day per trigger. Additionally, the policy health warning messages will be enhanced to assist admins with appropriate permissions in identifying and addressing noisy triggers effectively. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features: Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000. Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments. Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
item.description:
New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Publish to Viva Engage
item.description:
Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: AI-powered History search
item.description:
Enhanced search finds sites in your History even when you use a synonym, phrase, or typo. After this feature is turned on, sites you visit will be shown in enhanced history search results. An on-device model is trained using your data, which never leaves your device and is never sent to Microsoft. Admins can use the EdgeHistoryAISearchEnabled policy to disable this feature.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: External group chat policy enforcements for max two orgs
item.description:
Facilitate creation and maintenance of external group chats with bilateral policy enforcement where members in the chat can belong to a maximum of two tenants. Allow tenant admins to control bilateral chat policy and apply it to users and groups.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Modernized Viva Engage Email Subscription Management
item.description:
We will modernize the existing email subscription management experience in Viva Engage to make it more user-friendly and intuitive. Previously, unsubscribe and notification settings links in emails opened legacy web pages with limited functionality. After this update, those links will direct users to refreshed, modern pages where they can easily manage their email preferences. Users will be able to unsubscribe or resubscribe to specific email types in a cleaner and more accessible experience.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Town hall usage reports in TAC will have all the relevant usage data related to town hall events in the tenant.
item.description:
When Town hall was released, there were some columns/data related to each Town hall event that were missing in the TAC usage reports for IT Admins. Now all the relevant usage related data are added to the town hall usage reports available in the TAC portal for Admins.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Add folders from a .pst file to Favorites in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be only able to add folders from a .pst file to Favorites. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Add folders from a .pst file to Favorites in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be only able to add folders from a .pst file to Favorites. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Category Shortcuts in the New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Easily organize your inbox with quick-access category shortcuts! The shortcuts you loved in Classic Outlook will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, making it easier than ever to categorize emails. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Category Shortcuts in the New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Easily organize your inbox with quick-access category shortcuts! The shortcuts you loved in classic Outlook for Windows will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, making it easier than ever to categorize emails. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot generated summaries for call transfers on Teams phone devices
item.description:
Copilot generated summary provides an overview of the details and outcomes of transferred calls. It includes information such as the caller's details, the reason for the transfer, and the final resolution.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: GCC High support in Teams Rooms Pro Management
item.description:
The Pro Management service and admin portal is now available for GCC High customer tenants.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
item.description:
Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in DoD
item.description:
Teams Webinars are now available for the DoD community. DoD users can now schedule webinar instances with internal audiences, and leverage capabilities such as creation of an event page, attendee registration, automated emails, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Excel: Python in Excel for GCC
item.description:
Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for call delegation on Teams phone devices
item.description:
Call delegators and their delegates can now view shared call history records for the shared line directly on their Teams phone devices. This enhancement promotes greater transparency and collaboration. All delegates associated with a user will be able to monitor incoming and outgoing calls for the shared line, irrespective of their participation in the call.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Data Security Analytics
item.description:
Data Security analytics will serve as a launchpad for administrators, enabling them to swiftly navigate day-to-day tasks. It will provide a comprehensive overview of an organization’s sensitive data landscape, visibility into potential risks, and offer contextual recommendations to strengthen the organization's data security posture. The Data Security Copilot will serve as an intelligent AI assistant layered on top of data security analytics, supporting tasks related to administration, risk assessment, alert triage, and reporting. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Intune policies in the Edge management service
item.description:
Admins now can set Intune policies via the Edge management service, alongside the existing cloud policies. This enables admins to deploy both browser policies in the cloud and Intune policies from a single pane, making it easy to keep users safe and the browser workflow streamlined. This feature comes along with a new policy creation wizard that will streamline the creation process into a comprehensive, step-by-step flow.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
item.description:
This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
item.description:
With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules. Note: The month and status have been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: February CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Fix all spelling and grammar issues with Copilot
item.description:
One-click solution to fix spelling and grammar errors in the document
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Excel: Expanded eligibility for Python in Excel
item.description:
Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. With this release, we are expanding the eligibility for Python in Excel to include users with Microsoft 365 commercial licenses that only have access to the Microsoft 365 online apps, such as Office 365 E1 or Microsoft 365 Business Basic. Previously, Python in Excel was exclusive to users with paid Microsoft 365 commercial licenses that provided access to the Microsoft 365 desktop apps, such as Office 365 E3 and E5 licenses. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Support AAD based security groups across Viva learning
item.description:
Support AAD based security groups across Viva learning.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Streamlined, unified role-based access controls (RBAC) for Teams device management
item.description:
IT admins now benefit from unified role-based access controls across the Teams admin center and Teams Rooms Pro Management portals. This streamlines device management ensuring smooth transitions between portals and consistency in environment management.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
item.description:
Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Centralized admin role management from Engage admin center
item.description:
Manage network admin, verified admin & corporate communicator role enablement/ disablement from within the Engage admin center.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
item.description:
With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Auto-Remediation of Malicious Entity Clusters Identified in Automated Investigation and Response (AIR)
item.description:
The feature will expand upon the automated investigation and response (AIR) by enabling AIR to automatically remediate malicious entity clusters. AIR currently recommends actions for SecOps to approve or decline and this enhancement will allow customers to enable auto-remediation to allow AIR to act on recommendations and soft delete messages included in a malicious URL or malicious file cluster.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -User Schema Enhancements: Self-Serve Renaming for Custom Hierarchies
item.description:
This feature enables Viva Glint admins to rename existing hierarchies and hierarchy levels within the user schema. By providing a self-service capability, admins can easily manage and update the structure of user data without requiring external support.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Bi-directional Calendar Syncing between Google Workspace and Microsoft Teams
item.description:
Businesses using Google Workspace for email and calendaring can now enable bidirectional synchronization with Microsoft Teams through the Teams Admin app. This enhanced sync ensures that events created in either platform are seamlessly reflected in both, improving scheduling efficiency and minimizing the risk of missed meetings. With this update, all calendar events—including incoming, outgoing, existing, and new—are fully synchronized. This feature is being rolled out gradually. When rollout is complete, you can sync up to 50,000 users per tenant.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Customizable organizational statement for authors and responders
item.description:
Organizations can provide employees with guidelines based on their company policies as survey authors and respondents, along with default Pulse privacy guidance.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
item.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can view app ratings before installing apps or agents
item.description:
We have improved user options for sharing a link for a Teams app or a Microsoft 365 Copilot agent in a chat. Links to apps and agents will have a new preview card with user ratings for users to consider before installing apps or agents in Teams and clear actions like Add (which installs the app or agent) and View detail. A Microsoft 365 Copilot license is not required to share Copilot agent links but may be required to install and use the agent.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
item.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
item.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add hyperlink support in warn and block toast messages
item.description:
With this feature, data officers can now embed hyperlinks within toast messages for specific rules. When this rule is triggered, the end user will see a toast with a customized title and message with a hyperlink. This feature is useful when organizations need to direct users to a specific resource or a repository for more specific instruction (e.g. internal policy SharePoint site).
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed Engage Communities app in Teams mobile
item.description:
New, mobile-first experience to participate in communities aligned to personal interests and job functions.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
item.description:
We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
item.description:
The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Forwarding loop components
item.description:
After further review, we will not be rolling out to DoD. We apologize for any inconvenience. You can now forward chat messages containing Loop components, allowing for seamless sharing and real-time collaboration across different chats. To forward a message, navigate to it, click on the ellipsis, and select ‘Forward’ from the menu.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
item.description:
From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
item.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromised user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections. 1. Sign in risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific user. Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Resize Teams window and left and right panes
item.description:
Adjust the size of your Teams panes to prioritize what is currently most important for you, and/or snap and resize the Teams window with Windows 11 Snap layouts so you can view multiple applications side by side.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Move emails between accounts in the New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
We’re excited to announce a new feature in Outlook that makes it easier to manage emails across multiple accounts. All personal accounts in the new Outlook for Windows can seamlessly move emails between all their personal accounts, streamlining organization and productivity. For work or school users, this feature is controlled by a policy managed by administrators. By enabling this policy, admins can grant their users the ability to move emails between accounts in a way that aligns with organizational needs and policies. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Recommended policy scope
item.description:
Leverage policy scope insights to understand the aggregated volume of policy violations that are missed from users that are not currently scoped into the policy. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: July CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Search: Content source filters in Microsoft Search
item.description:
Users can filter results by content source in the All vertical in Microsoft Search in microsoft365.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing @ Work. This feature will be available for all tenants with multiple sources configured in Microsoft Search (such as Power BI, Viva Learning, and third-party sources indexed via Microsoft Graph Connectors).
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Storyline integrated in Teams
item.description:
Storyline from Viva Engage is now integrated in Teams. Get organization-wide communication from your leaders, discover and share content with your colleagues and express your perspectives, all from your flow of work in Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses
item.description:
Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses hosted at SuccessFactors can be displayed at Viva Learning.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for SuccessFactors integration
item.description:
Admins can now specify the user mapping attributes in the LMS setup form.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Create articles and questions more easily with the updated "Create new" button.
item.description:
